story:
Hi! I'm Nick!

I'm a storyteller - always have been. From the time I sprayed my little brother with the hose at one of our kiddy pool outings and told my mom it was sweat [1991] to documenting a tale of youthful wanderlust along the Pacific coastline [2011], I've been obsessed with captivating others with stories. 

For the last four years, I've been capturing my surroundings and those that inspire me - camera always in hand. My heart beats for soft, natural light, pure and raw energy, and a connection with both my subject and audience. What inspires me most about living a creative life is that I can wake up in the morning and grab a camera or pencil or Super Twin Tip Permanent Sharpie Marker™, and make something that didn’t exist yesterday.

The Mission

This October, a team of medical professionals and I will travel to Haiti to partake in a medical relief trip - one that several of the team members make every year. I have been asked to contribute both medically and creatively, assisting where needed in the pharmacy and registration while providing a body of photographic work documenting the many admirable people who contribute their time to provide efficient medical care to those in need. 

The Skinny

The funds generated from this campaign will be used to provide transportation from the Cheshire Medical Center in Keene, NH to Logan International Airport in Boston, MA to Port-Au-Prince, Haiti. It will also supply the team and myself with medical translators, food, lodging, transportation while in Haiti, and other necessary amenities. Extra funds will cover camera equipment rentals and data storage. And scrubs. 

The Impact

While I personally have no medical background, I will work to help ensure the team sees close to 250 people a day. We often hear mainstream media report the devastation and hardships that third world countries undergo but I think it's important to understand that there are people who are helping and contributing. My goal is take my love for storytelling and photography and share these stories of selflessness. Integrating photography, travel, and a helping hand, this project is exactly the kind of work I hope to continue creating throughout my career. 

No money? No problem!

I understand not everyone has the funds to contribute so sharing this project on your social avenues means just as much to me! Post this Indiegogo campain page to your Facebook and Twitter feeds, talk about it over dinner with your friends, or mention the project to your dog while on your morning run. No donation is too small and no effort goes unrecognized.

Thank you again for your love and support. Cyber high-five! And a hug when I see you next!

story:
CORRO Targets Core Strength

We designed CORRO to include numerous features to fit into almost any training style! Take advantage of the Corro product for solo workouts or partner workouts.

  • PUSH UP GRIPS 
  • AB ROLLER
  • RESISTANCE BANDS - (Pro Version) Equipped with 10/20/30 lb. resistance bands

 

 

 

 

 

 

Part of the CORRO design is to ensure you can perform one arm movements to improve muscle imbalances.

The resistance bands help you perform a full standing ab roll out movement, simply engages your entire body from head to toe!

One product but double the effect! Why stand or sit and wait for your partner to finish their set. CORRO gives both partners a great workout at the same time.

 

 

 

 

CORRO Fit Benefits

Compact for Travel!

150+ Exercises - Chest flys, ab rolls, glute kickbacks, and dozens more!

Designed for All Fitness Levels - Corro 

Clip-in Bands to Add Resistance 

Ergonomically designed and eco-friendly material

 

Hurry!  Prices will go up, snag your FREE Corro Drawstring bag! 

We're offering a FREE Corro bag to the first 200 awesome backers !!

 

 

 

HOW CORRO STARTED

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

Where's CORRO at Today?

We have already launched and completed our successful campaign on Kickstarter!

http://kck.st/2ZMUzdV

CORRO manufacturing has been completed and packaging will be completed by December 6, 2020. We will then be sending the product to our fulfillment center to ship the product directly to you! 

You can follow us on Instagram/Facebook where we will be sharing updates with our bakers on a regular basis. You will also be able to see the product being used by our Ambassadors. We are very excited about our launch and can't wait for you to try it!

 

FOLLOW US

story:
Hi!

Ich bin Max. Meine große Liebe ist das Reisen mit dem Fahrrad. Jede Fahrt ist ein neues Abenteuer und für mich eine besonders schöne Art Länder, Orte und Menschen kennen zulernen. Während meiner ersten größeren Fahrradtour nach Den Haag habe ich festgestellt, dass brennende Oberschenkel, Schokomüsliriegel und schlechter Schlaf auf harten Isomatten ein unbeschreibliches Freiheitsgefühl bedeuten können. So folgten zahlreiche Touren, wie zum Beispiel eine Fahrt von Chemnitz nach Zagreb oder die legendäre Heckmair-Transalp. Ich bin stets auf der Suche nach neuen Radreise-Herausforderungen und damit bei dieser Idee gelandet:

Ich werde mit einem Fixie von 8bar (ja, mit einem Gang!) durch 19 Länder Europas Fahren. Für die ca. 10.000km habe ich 4 Monate eingeplant.

Mit der Tour möchte ich mich selbst auf die Probe stellen und die landschaftliche und kulturelle Vielfältigkeit Europas kennen lernen.


Zusätzlich will ich mit meinem Blog ein Zeichen für die Gleichberechtigung von Fahrradfahrern im Straßenverkehr und die Fahrradkultur setzen. Ich werde versuchen unterwegs an so vielen Critical Mass Veranstaltungen wie möglich teilzunehmen, denn regelmäßige Treffen gibt in jeder größeren Stadt Europas.

Critical Mass ist eine kreative Form des Straßenprotests, bei der sich mehrere Fahrradfahrer scheinbar völlig zufällig treffen, um gemeinsam durch Innenstädte zu fahren und nach dem Motto „Wir blockieren nicht den Verkehr, wir sind der Verkehr!“ auf ihre Gleichberechtigung gegenüber dem motorisierten Verkehr aufmerksam zu machen.

Die gesamte Tour wird mit Bildern, Videos und Reiseberichten festgehalten, die regelmäßig auf meinem Blog erscheinen werden.

Start der Tour ist Anfang April 2015.

Wie du mir helfen kannst

Wenn dir mein Projekt gefällt, kannst du mich jederzeit unterstützen. Gib mir ein Bier aus, schick mir ein virtuelles High-Five indem du meinen Blog verbreitest oder hilf mir die Kosten zu decken und spende so viel du willst.

Jeder eingenommene Euro wird für notwendige Ausgaben während Tour genutzt. Der Großteil der Einnahmen wird für Verpflegung und Verschleißteile am Fahrrad genutzt. Weiterhin werde ich beispielsweise bei der Überquerung nach England oder zwischen Finnland und Schweden Fähren benutzen, für die ich Tickets benötige. Ich werde zwar versuchen, so oft wie es geht zu zelten oder Couchsurfing zu nutzen, trotzdem lässt sich ein Aufenthalt im Hostel manchmal nicht vermeiden. 

Die Perks

€8EUR

Supporter

Dein Name erscheint als Unterstützer auf meinem Blog. Von unterwegs sende ich dir eine persönliche digitale Postkarte.

€15EUR

From Nagykanizsa with love

Du bekommst eine reale Postkarte aus einer zufälligen Stadt oder einer Stadt deiner Wahl auf der Route. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€35EUR

Westpaket

Eine Dose Surströmming oder selbstgepflückte Kräuter der Provence? Ich schicke dir aus einer zufälligen Stadt oder einer Stadt deiner Wahl ein Souvenir und eine Postkarte. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€50EUR

Rickroll‘d

Schicke mir einen Song deiner Wahl. Ich werde ihn einen Tag lang in der Dauerschleife hören und ihn dir in einem persönlichen Video vorsingen. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€85EUR

Wo ist Waldo?

Du erhältst nach dem Ende meiner Tour einen limitierten Kalender mit den 12 besten Bildern des Abenteuers. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€100EUR

Einen Steinmenschen bauen

Ich nehme einen Gegenstand deiner Wahl mit auf die Reise. Da Menge, Größe und Gewicht limitiert sind, kann ich leider keine Schwiegermütter oder deine Magickarten-Sammlung mitnehmen! Die Zeitung von letzter Woche und deine Steuererklärung von 2007 könnten mich jedoch die ganze Fahrt über begleiten. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€250EUR

mächtiger Foliant des Wissens

Erhalte eine hochwertige und mit Bildern der Tour sowie Seiten meines handgeschriebenen Schiffstagebuchs gefüllte Fibel mit persönlicher Widmung. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€500EUR

Where is this Pussymagnet?

Ich rasiere mir einen Schnauzer und fahre einen ganzen Tag der Tour im Mankini. Ein Herz mit deinem Namen wird meinen Körper zieren. Zusätzlich: Supporter

€999EUR

Kerzenschein und Dosenravioli

Ich besuche dich nach meiner Reise und wir fahren eine kleine Fahrradtour. Anschließend zaubere ich dir auf meinem Campingkocher ein Abendessen und erzähle ausführlich von meiner Europatour. Bilder und Videos werden selbstverständlich ungeschnitten mitgebracht. Zusätzlich: Supporter / Wo ist Waldo? / mächtiger Foliant des Wissens

story:
The Track: 

Office life got you down? Join our team and help us on our trek to Tucson. 

The Terminal City All-Stars are the Terminal City Rollergirls' Women’s Flat Track Derby Association (WFTDA) charter team, made up of the best roller derby athletes in Vancouver. The WFTDA is the international governing body for the sport of women’s flat track roller derby, a membership organization that sanctions local and international competitions of member leagues. 

Learn about the incredible world of roller derby here!

This September the All-Stars will travel 2,679 kilometres to compete at the 2015 WFTDA Division 1 tournament in Tucson, Arizona. We are excited to skate against and alongside high-level teams from as far away as Melbourne, Australia and St. Louis, MO. 

We Need Support:

To keep our 'office' running smoothly we need help to cover our travel costs. Here’s where you come in! The journey to divisionals has its price; training, equipment, practice space and cross-country travel don’t come free to unpaid athletes.  This year we hope to raise 5k to help get us there!

JOIN OUR TEAM:

The Impact

With your support, hardworking and dedicated Vancouver athletes will be showcased on the world stage, and will set a precedent for excellence within the Western Canadian roller derby community for years to come. Your generosity will help pay for entry fees and travel expenses for the tournament. Be part of this amazing journey, and help us get to Divisionals!

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on social media and help us spread the word about this campaign:

Website: http://www.terminalcityrollergirls.com/allstars 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TerminalCityAllStars 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TCRGAllStars

Email us about sponsorship opportunities: jannasponsorship@gmail.com Questions? Or need technical help? Email xandra.evans@gmail.com

story:
The Problem: Kerosene Lanterns

When the sun goes down on the 5 million Ghanaians living off the power grid, they are forced to resort to kerosene lanterns to provide light. Kerosene lighting is:

Dangerous. Devastating house fires destroy wood/grass-based homes. Parents can't leave children unattended for fear of serious burn injuries. 

Unhealthy. Breathing the poisonous smoke produced by kerosene is equivalent to smoking 2 packs of cigarettes per day.  Many rural homes are poorly ventilated and trap in fumes. 

Expensive. 15 Billion USD are spent in Africa each year on fuel-based lighting. Families are forced to pay recurring kerosene bills, costing up to 20% of their income. 

The Solution: Solar Lamps Sold by Yenso Solar

There are numerous benefits to replacing kerosene with solar. Solar lamps provide safer, cleaner, and more affordable lighting than kerosene lanterns. Students are able to study after it gets dark (imagine how bad your grades would have been if you couldn't study after it was dark!) Increased quality of education leads to increased income. The quality of air within the home is vastly improved. The number of house fires are vastly decreased. Monthly kerosene costs disappear altogether. Families are left with a warmer light where they can work, study, and play together in safety.

We've partnered with the experienced international solar manufacturers Greenlight Planet and Little Sun to provide a variety of affordable but high quality solar lamps designed to meet the needs of rural families.

Your Impact

Yenso currently operates in 8 villages and has helped bring light over 1,000 Ghanaians. Students have enjoyed hundreds of increased study hours. Numerous women experience better health and cleaner air. This summer we will be expanding to twelve new villages. Every dollar donated will help grow Yenso's efforts to bring light to families in Ghana. The money will be used to purchase a larger inventory of lamps, hire and train sales representatives, and offset the costs of starting Yenso in new villages. Your support will provide opportunity for the future entrepreneurs, scientists, and leaders of Africa. The results of your donations will not go unseen. Follow Yenso Solar on social media throughout the summer to see the direct impact of your generous donations on thousands of Ghanaians.

The Yenso Solar Model

We created Yenso Solar to find sustainable, long-term ways to deliver solar solutions to rural homes in Ghana. We are a social venture creating innovative and effective impact.

Our current business model has been validated by in-country testing and by the experiences of our partners in other regions. Yenso Solar purchases lamps from manufacturers at wholesale price and distributes them through an innovative sales strategy: direct sales to households and small businesses and partnerships with reputable and recognized salesmen already based in hard to reach areas and villages.

Yenso Solar partners with retailers in individual villages, who help advertise and sell the product to fellow villagers. These retailers utilize an already established sales system and network, and are trusted in their individual villagers. Yenso Solar retail partners are given a few lamps, advertising materials, and a Yenso marketing partner to help them advertise their new product. Retail partners and marketing representatives are paid on commission. In mid-size towns, Yenso employs full-time direct sales representatives, paid on commission, who sell lamps through relationship networks.

 

 

Need more information?

This summary only scratches the surface of what Yenso Solar intends to accomplish this summer and beyond. Those who wish to know more before making a donation are encouraged to contact us via our website: www.yensosolargh.com or email us at info@yensosolargh.com. You can expect a reply within 24 hours.

story:
In short 

We've been working to make bataua palm fruit harvests sustainable for many years now. But our team has only just begun working with the fruit oil. Our plan was for someone else to create markets for the oil, while we worked on the harvest side. We got tired of waiting. The harvesters got tired of waiting. Together we decided to make and sell products that use sustainably-harvested bataua fruit oil. Even on a small scale. It's the only way to get things moving.

Others have taken a different approach. They use a little bit of the oil - maybe even just a tiny bit - and they put their energies into mass-marketed products. That's fine, so long as the fruit harvests do not involved cutting the whole tree down. Unfortunately, most bataua fruit still comes from destructive harvests of decades-old trees. 

We need you to join us, to use the oil, use the soaps, to feel their benefits, and to grow the sustainable bataua fruit market together.

When they are harvesting bataua fruit for sale, our partners, who live in rain forests, can increase their incomes by 2-4x. Bataua palms are common where they haven't been cut down and so the supply of oil is plentiful. This is not a niche product. It is potentially on par with global olive oil production. Our longer-term goal is to move past exchanging gear for fruit to outright fruit purchases. We want to provide the climbing tools that harvesters use to bring their fruit to market safely and efficiently. There is an enormous potential to do good and do well with bataua fruit oil products. 

The deal

We need to sell all of the soap and oil that we have, to reinvest the proceeds in palm climbing gear. We've chosen to run a flexible campaign because - while we put plenty of pressure on ourselves to build the project - there is no failure point below which we would be unable to fulfill the perks we are offering. 

Clearly these are premium prices for premium products that have a direct impact improving the lives of fruit harvesters in the Amazon. If we did the accounting on the time and effort that have gone into being able to offer you our bataua oil and soaps - well, we'd rather not think about that.

When we meet our campaign goal, we will be able to deliver 75 sets of gear to harvesters.

The Perks

"TOLU" We found this song after a few hours of poking around online. Our kids danced to it, and that was it. We paid a guy from Bratislava named Duhan for the rights to use it in this campaign and he extended the track for us.

Fleischman's Handmade  Great soap made in the San Francisco Bay Area. Bataua oil replaces "palm oil" in this version of their tried and true formula, Sticking with the other ingredients ensures a hard soap that produces a lather. Offered with Rosemary-lavender and unscented. 

Bataua Oil Soap As basic as it gets. You've used 100% olive oil soap? We used bataua oil, instead, so it is extremely simple. This is a creamy-textured soap, light on lather. We may tweak the recipe after the first month but this soap does what we ask of it: it cleans your skin and it delivers bataua oil.

Straight Bataua Oil The oil is heavy at 60, 70, 80 degrees. Warm it up and it begins to move. A hair stylist who has used it reported that a very small amount went a long way with heat. Creates a lustrous look without the silicone found in many hair oils. It absorbs very well into the skin, for example on the arms and hands.

Summing up

The risks here are pretty minimal. Most of the soap has been made already. The oil has been filtered and is sitting in Berkeley. It's not as though we are proposing to do something we haven't tried, quite the opposite. 

By buying in, you can be 1000% sure that the premium price you'll pay for these exceptional products will reach all the way back to the rain forests and the people who live there.

We've been working to make bataua palm fruit harvests sustainable for many years now. But our team has only just begun working with the fruit oil. Our plan was for someone else to create markets for the oil, while we worked on the harvest side. We got tired of waiting. The harvesters got tired of waiting. Together we decided to make and sell products that use sustainably-harvested bataua fruit oil. Even on a small scale. It's the only way to get things moving.
Others have taken a different approach. They use a little bit of the oil - maybe even just a tiny bit - and they put their energies into mass-marketed products. That's fine, so long as the fruit harvests do not involved cutting the whole tree down. Unfortunately, most bataua fruit still comes from destructive harvests of decades-old trees.

story:
Jesyka's life changed forever on June 3 when her boyfriend introduced a bullet into her spine, leaving her quadriplegic. 


Formerly:

* Gold Medal Nevada Womens State Fitness Model Competition

*Lambda Beta Honor Society (College)

*Critical Care Respiratory Care Practitioner...


Currently:

*breathes through a trach tube on a mechanical ventilator

*cant move anything below her neck 

*jaw is wired shut, making it impossible to lip read


Not that you'd have to, simce her eyes say it all. They need a voice.

They can get one for $3805, but her insurance says they don't cover that. They're not going to cover the $270,000 to follow Chris Reeves' (Superman's) PT regimen either. 

If we can get her online, she could email Oprah. Oprah makes Super PT happen for breakfast.

Lets repair the irreparable! 

Independence Day is coming up. Help Jesyka observe it with some independence!

story:
The team at Ryonet is working to raise $10,000 or more for our friend and co-worker, Mike Scoggins who is a part of our Marketing department. Regardless of meeting our goal, all funds raised for Mike will be used to assist his family with medical expenses related to the motorcycle crash he was involved in on Saturday, August 24th.

A brief press release can be read here: http://www.columbian.com/news/2013/aug/25/motorcyclist-seriously-injured-late-night-crash/.

Mike has undergone surgery and will begin speech and physical therapy right away. Our hope is for him and his family to be able to focus on his recovery without the worry and stress of finances, so we are reaching out and asking people to help in any way they can.

*****UPDATE 9/3/13*****

We now know more of Mike's injuries and wanted to update you all.  Mike injured the C4, 5 and 6 vertebrae in his neck.  After two surgeries to stabilize his neck, he had a respirator put in to assist with his breathing, then also had an additional surgery to set a broken thumb. There were issues of fluid building in his lungs, but he has been breathing much better today. The severity overall of these injuries means that Mike will have to work hard to regain movement in his arms and legs. His positive spirit and drive to move on to therapy has us all inspired.  If anyone can overcome this, it is Mike!

We do not know what the continued medical costs and rehabilitation expense will be for Mike, but we all thank you for your support!

*****UPDATE 10/10/13*****
Mike has had some challenges in his healing. Mike is currently fighting pneumonia, which means he is still on the respirator. Mike's lungs seem to be finally clearing so we are hopeful he gets over the pneumonia quickly.
The great news is that Mike has been able to do physical therapy and now has some movement in his right arm and wrist. Once the pneumonia clears Mike will be able to continue his therapies.

Thank you everyone for your ongoing support.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mason. When I was 12 years old i was diagnosed with brain cancer, luckily the tumor was removed, but it left me with cerebellar ataxia of my right side. Cerebellar ataxia is a lack of muscle coordination which may affect speech, eye movements, the ability to swallow, walking, picking up objects and other voluntary movements. Everyday seems harder than the last and I have tried many medications and treatment including botox over the last 12 years, and I an at the point where stem cell treatment is the only resort left. It will be preformed by Doctor Mark Youseff in California. It costs 20k that my insurance doesn't cover at all, that is why I'm reaching out for help. 

My hand shakes almost all the time, so every task that I do has to be approached in a very different way. take cooking for example, I have sliced my hand many many time with a knife trying to cut vegetables, the most resent is slicing me half of the tip of my thumb. Because of my hand shaking constantly I have also suffered many burns from trying to reach for pots and pans. My right leg also has a lack of coordination. I'm constantly running into tables and chairs and even walls. I can hardly walk in a straight line down the side walk or talk with someone walking next to me without running in to the. I also lose my balance a lot, sometimes while standing still.

This treatment will repair the hole left in my cerebellum by my tumor, allowing me to do what most take for granted. It is expensive but I believe investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make. it will not only improve your life, it will improve the lives of all those around you.

What We Need & What You Get

  • $5 Will help me get one step closer to getting this treatment.
  • $10 Will get a personalized card from me to tell you how grateful I am for your support
  • $20 This will get a personalized card from me the you how grateful I am for your support and a handmade bracelet.

The Impact

This treatment will change my life, It will give me the ability to do things that where otherwise impossible and improve my quality of life.

Other Ways You Can

Help Spread the word and share the link

story:
For those of you who know her or have only met her once, I am sure you will not forget her, the beautiful woman my sweet Zara is named after, Corrine AKA Grandma Cody.

Now well into her 80’s we would like to get her moved from Arizona to Michigan where most of her children reside. This is going to be a huge expense for my family and we cannot accomplish this without your help. This is going to help with the cost of moving her entire trailer across the country and getting it set up with utilities once it arrives at the planned location and we need to make this happen rather quickly to make this transition for grandma as easy as possible.

For those of you who do not know my grandma let me say a few words. Growing up she was my idol! She was beautiful, fashionable, funny and free spirited and everything I wanted to be. She is a 2 time Cancer survivor and one tough cookie, the patriarch of our family and the women who help to blaze the trail of a long list of strong,  bad ass women that I am blessed to share my genes with.

As I write this I am brought to tears thinking about the times I have almost had to say good bye to her and now to think about it once again is almost more than I can stand. So please help move this amazing women to her family for the care, love and support that she needs and for the happiness of her soul in the remaining years of her life.

Anything helps, please help us to make my dear Cody know she is loved.

Thank you all for your love and support now and always.

story:
Thank you for visiting my Humla Medical Service Trip fundraising page!  

I feel very honored to have been asked to join a group of medical practitioners, led by a Tibetan Bon Buddhist lama, on a 2-week trip to Humla, a remote area of Nepal, to photographically document their efforts to bring free medical care to this very poor community.  Most of the residents of Humla will, otherwise, never see a doctor in their lives.

When I first started my career as a photographer, back in 1989, one of the countries I visited was Nepal.  I spent about a month hiking in the Himalayas, meeting and learning about the Tibetan people living there, and their culture, and I was so touched by their generosity, and gratitude for what little they had.  I cannot fully express how right it feels to me to go back, and give back, to a people who opened my eyes to beauty and compassion and a spiritual way of life, in a way that I had never experienced before.

This trip is the first in a venture which hopes to eventually bring education, as well as continuing medical care, to this region, and in that vein, documenting it is a vital element in building the project, and growing that seed.

Each volunteer – be that a medical practitioner, or an organizer, or photographer – is responsible for their personal costs of the trip, totaling about $5000:

·  Flight to Kathmandu: about $1600

·  Ground and air transportation once in Nepal, food, lodging, Nepalese staff for camping and trekking, and a translator and guide: $3400

I will also have the expense of additional photography equipment that is necessary when working in an area without regular and dependable access to electricity, such as additional memory cards and batteries, and the renting of an extra camera in case of malfunctions.  This will cost an additional $1000.

I have made a commitment to participating, and providing my services, and all funds raised will go towards this trip, regardless of whether I meet my goal or not.  (The stated goal on this site is $4000, rather than $6000, as the fees for the site are lower if you meet your goal!)

Of course, the lack of electricity in this area will pose a particular challenge, and I am working hard to trouble-shoot any potential problems prior to embarking on the trip.  I have the experience of traveling and photographing in remote areas, as well as working in commercial photography, both of which entail constant technical trouble shooting, so it is something I am accustomed to.

My work in recent years has been focused on portraits and children, and is fairly journalistic in nature. (If you are interested, please feel free to take a look at my website.) I am thrilled to continue this work in Humla, with the children and other community members of these villages, and hopefully touch others with pictures portraying the humanity and wisdom of a people who so moved me over 20 years ago.

Please contribute if you can, and if that is not possible for you, but you are excited by the possibilities and potential of the Humla Medical Service Trip, please forward this on to anyone else who you think will be touched by it, and might be able to contribute, or forward it on, themselves.

For more information, please see the webpage of the Humla Medical Service Trip.

story:
"I'm ready - get the test"

News: American Thyroid Association Makes Case for Universal Thyroid Screening in Pregnancy View

Your Thyroid Gland

It's essential to your health because it controls how your body uses oxygen and regulates your metabolism. It’s a butterfly-shaped organ in your neck that controls the oxygen level of all the cells in your body.

The ‘Back of the Classroom’ Troublemaker

Misunderstood and generally misdiagnosed, the thyroid gland is often the culprit of chronic symptoms such as fatigue, weight change, loss of memory, difficulty concentrating, dry skin and nails, hair loss, sensitivity to cold, and depression. This includes issues with your sex life, problems with conceiving, pregnancy problems, postpartum health issues, and the health of the baby.

Recognize these symptoms? What can you do?


Test It. Score It. Fix It.


Get Your Thyroid Tested Without Leaving Home

Know Your ThyroScore

The first step in thyroid care is to test the amount of Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) in your blood, also known as your ThyroScore. Too much TSH is called hypothyroidism. Too little TSH is hyperthyroidism. Both conditions are tiresome ways of living, and they can be easily corrected with treatment by your doctor.

Using the newly developed ThyroScore Health Kit you will self-administer a simple and fast at-home blood test and send the results, along with a brief questionnaire, to our CLIA certified laboratory for analysis.
Patented Blood Collection Card



What We're Doing With the Funds We Raise

Besides processing your thyroid test, we are financing FDA testing to gain approval of a new, hand-held medical device that will enable medical professionals to obtain your TSH results in 15 minutes. This advanced microscopy device uses one drop of blood on an existing, immunoassay test under LED illumination to determine your results simply and accurately. Developed by Holomic, LLC, a spinoff from UCLA’s Engineering School, the HDR-200 will make thyroid testing a routine and inexpensive procedure.

  • The Technology - Place a drop of blood on our ThyroTest® card and insert it into the Holomic HRDR-200. The test card is then imaged under LED-based illumination in a special optical interface. Captured raw images are digitally processed through a smartphone application to reveal test results immediately.
    		•
  • FDA Submission - We're not able to use this technology in today's health fair, though we’ve starting trials already. With your pledges and support, we can pursue an FDA (510)k submission and make thyroid testing fast, easy, and affordable for everyone. (View Video or View Press Release)

Universal Thyroid Testing

While many have recommended that all pregnant women have their thyroids tested, we believe that thyroid testing should become as routine as having one’s temperature and blood pressure taken as part of any medical intake procedure.  We want people to know their ThyroScore (i.e. TSH Level) as matter-of-factly as they know their blood pressure, for it is an excellent measure of one’s health.

If you're a health conscious person, but you've never measured your thyroid health, then we invite you to find out if you're among the 15 million Americans living with unnecessary fatigue, depression, weight changes, or other symptoms of an unhealthy thyroid.

Get ThyroScore today and help us make thyroid testing fast, easy, and affordable for everyone:

Thanks to everyone for their support in launching the program so far – we couldn’t have done it without you!


Sincerely,

Sharon Cunningham
Tom McLellan
Bruce Rodin  



UPDATE: (9-27-2013) - New demo video of the Holomic HRDR-200 'Smartphone Lab". The future of on-site thyroid testing. View on our campaign update page.

Note: This program is available to participants in all US states except NY due to state legislation, and in Canada.  We plan to expand to other regions in the future, and we’re always on the lookout for partners.  Please visit ThyroScore.org for details and to stay up to date with our latest news. 

Delivery Timing: We will deliver the first set of ThyroScore test kits in late October. It’s difficult to predict how quickly we will sell out of our first 1,000 kits as we have a few new partner promotions coming online shortly.  If you would like to find out your ThyroScore, please make your pledge now so we can ensure timely delivery as part of our first 1,000 kit orders.  

Disclaimer: All test results are for screening purposes only. Results should not be used to diagnose or treat any condition. Please consult your physician or healthcare provider for interpretation and clinical follow-up. Do not adjust your medication or treatment based on these results. The HRDR-200 is available for sale globally. Note that in the US, the HRDR-200 is available for non-clinical research use only.

We wish to thank our lab partner, New Century Diagnostics, for their support in launching ThyroScore. New Century Diagnostics is a state-of-the-art CLIA-waived laboratory located in Buffalo Grove, Illinois, and analyzes all ThyroScore tests using an Advia (Siemens) Centaur scientific analyzer.

*Source: The American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists estimates that 15 million Americans have a thyroid problem and are unaware of it.

Privacy: We take privacy seriously. When you participate in ThyroScore, your information is stored in a secure database, and your ThyroScore report is delivered using SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption. Your personal information will never be sold or rented to third parties. We scrub all data records to remove personal names and identifiers, and make an anonymous version of the data available for research and analysis related to future health policy.

Questions? Share your comments or email us at questions@thyroscore.org and we'll respond as soon as possible.

Patented Blood Collection Card

Besides processing your thyroid test, we are financing FDA testing to gain approval of a new, hand-held medical device that will enable medical professionals to obtain your TSH results in 15 minutes.  This advanced microscopy device uses one drop of blood on an existing, immunoassay test under LED illumination to determine your results simply and accurately.  Developed by Holomic, LLC, a spinoff from UCLA’s Engineering School, the HDR-200 will make thyroid testing a routine and inexpensive procedure. 



The Technology - Place a drop of blood on our ThyroTest® card and insert it into the Holomic HRDR-200. The test card is then imaged under LED-based illumination in a special optical interface. Captured raw images are digitally processed through a smartphone application to reveal test results immediately.



FDA Submission - We're not able to use this technology in today's health fair, though we’ve starting trials already. With your pledges and support, we can pursue an FDA (510)k submission and make thyroid testing fast, easy, and affordable for everyone.  (View Video or View Press Release)

Universal Thyroid Testing
While many have recommended that all pregnant women have their thyroids tested, we believe that thyroid testing should become as routine as having one’s temperature and blood pressure taken as part of any medical intake procedure.  We want people to know their ThyroScore (i.e. TSH Level) as matter-of-factly as they know their blood pressure, for it is an excellent measure of one’s health.
If you're a health conscious person, but you've never measured your thyroid health, then we invite you to find out if you're among the 15 million Americans living with unnecessary fatigue, depression, weight changes, or other symptoms of an unhealthy thyroid. 
Get ThyroScore today and help us make thyroid testing fast, easy, and affordable for everyone:
Thanks to everyone for their support in launching the program so far – we couldn’t have done it without you!

Sincerely,
Sharon CunninghamTom McLellanBruce Rodin  

UPDATE: (9-27-2013) - New demo video of the Holomic HRDR-200 'Smartphone Lab". The future of on-site thyroid testing. View on our campaign update page.
Note: This program is available to participants in all US states except NY due to state legislation, and in Canada.  We plan to expand to other regions in the future, and we’re always on the lookout for partners.  Please visit ThyroScore.org for details and to stay up to date with our latest news. 
Delivery Timing: We will deliver the first set of ThyroScore test kits in late October.  It’s difficult to predict how quickly we will sell out of our first 1,000 kits as we have a few new partner promotions coming online shortly.  If you would like to find out your ThyroScore, please make your pledge now so we can ensure timely delivery as part of our first 1,000 kit orders.  
Disclaimer: All test results are for screening purposes only. Results should not be used to diagnose or treat any condition. Please consult your physician or healthcare provider for interpretation and clinical follow-up.  Do not adjust your medication or treatment based on these results. The HRDR-200 is available for sale globally. Note that in the US, the HRDR-200 is available for non-clinical research use only.  
We wish to thank our lab partner, New Century Diagnostics, for their support in launching ThyroScore.  New Century Diagnostics is a state-of-the-art CLIA-waived laboratory located in Buffalo Grove, Illinois, and analyzes all ThyroScore tests using an Advia (Siemens) Centaur scientific analyzer.
*Source: The American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists estimates that 15 million Americans have a thyroid problem and are unaware of it. 
Privacy: We take privacy seriously.  When you participate in ThyroScore, your information is stored in a secure database, and your ThyroScore report is delivered using SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption. Your personal information will never be sold or rented to third parties.  We scrub all data records to remove personal names and identifiers, and make an anonymous version of the data available for research and analysis related to future health policy. 

Questions?  Share your comments or email us at questions@thyroscore.org and we'll respond as soon as possible.

story:
HILLARY QUINN-KIND MEDICAL AND FUNERAL EXPENSE FUNDRAISER 100%

Unfortunately, Hillary lost her battle yesterday on 10/21/12.

This fundraiser has been set up to help the immediate family with funeral expenses and medical expenses as well.

Hillary was my cousin and although unfortunately we were not close, I feel this is the least I can do and this will hopefully help the family dramatically.

WHAT IS NEEDED

I have setup a goal of 5000.00 which is probably 1/10th if not 1/100th of actual expenses. Anything will help. If you only want to donate $1.

Please DO !!!

I have setup this as a flexible auction at 120 days which i believe to be the maximum.

 100% of any money donated goes directly to the family. The only people taking their cut are probably going to be indiegogo and paypal which is unfortunate, but what can you do.


I am confident that this goal will be reached and hopefully exceeded.

If the goal is not reached, 100% of any proceeds will still go directly to the family.

 

WHY SHOULD YOU CONTRIBUTE ?

Because it is going to a good cause helping out a family in need at a dificult time and most of all it feels good.

 

PERKS

Most friends and family probably won't need perks when they contribute.

However: for those of you that do, I am offering some perks for donations.

 

 

PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN ON YOUR SOCIAL NETWORKING SITES.

I feel this is absolutely imperative for the success of this campaign. so please share this wether you plan to make a donation or not.

PLEASE SHARE THIS !!!! PLEASE SHARE THIS !!!

 

THANK YOU !!! THANK YOU !!! THANK YOU !!!

 

ADDITIONALLY THERE IS ANOTHER FUNDING CAMPAIGN ALREADY IN PROGRESS SO HERE IS A LINK TO THAT AS WELL.

https://www.wepay.com/donations/hillary-kind-medical-bills-fundraising

additionally, here are a couple links to stand up 2 cancer.

http://standup2cancer.org

 

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me directly.

THANK YOU !!! THANK YOU !!! THANK YOU !!!

story:
Hello to everyone, my name is Kandace Bellofatto and I would like to introduce you to the Casey Bellofatto fundraiser that I have started in honor of my little sister Casey. Casey is the beloved daughter to Chris and Katrina Bellofatto and an amazing sister to not only me but her two younger brothers. This fundraiser has been created to raise awareness and money in order for Casey to receive the highest quality of medical attention and support systems needed during these very difficult times to recovery.

Casey was involved in a very serious automobile accident that occurred on January 11, 2013 in Carroll County MD. Casey has endured substantial injuries as a result of her accident and is currently being treated at the Bay View Medical Hospital. I will continue to provide available information to this website to ensure correct updates on Casey and her long journey to recovery. What is most important now is providing Casey with the finest available Doctors, equipment, medicine and most importantly support. It has become our entire families mission to not let our much-loved sister to three and daughter leave us without a fight. We truly appreciate any contribution toward helping support Casey in this very important time of need.

We have set a goal of $100,000.000 that we would like to achieve by May 18, 2013 (?) All of the proceeds raised will go directly toward Casey’s treatment, medical and recovery needs. This is just the beginning of what will be no doubt the most difficult journey for Casey and our Family. We are so blessed to have Casey in our lives and to share her with each and every one of you. Please help Casey continue to make an impact on all of our lives. I can already tell you how greatly touched Casey would be just knowing the love and support that those around her are sharing on her behalf. Without a shadow of a doubt, I know we will reach our goal of $100,000.000 and together we can make this happen.  

This fundraiser is not only to raise money toward Casey and her recovery but to raise awareness for a young girl who has so much more to offer now and in her future. The power of information and social networks these days is unbelievable. We are asking that you tell others about Casey and the relationship you have built with her and how each and every donation can go a long way.  We truly appreciate each and every donation made to Casey Bellofatto’s fundraiser.

At a young 18 years of age, Casey has already developed several relationships and strong friendships with so many. I know Casey will pull through these tough times because under all that beauty is a fighter, and since we are positive she will be fighting to stay with us, we are going to continue to go to battle for her. Casey is a bright, bubbly outgoing person who is always ready to take on any challenge placed before her. This may be her greatest challenge yet, and we will be there every step of the way.

Casey has future aspirations to continue with school and become a cosmetologist, which I could never argue with because of her natural talent to do incredible makeup and hair with a great sense of style. We want to guarantee that Casey be able to continue in her dreams in the future. Casey has always said she would like to make an impact on this world we call home and now is your chance to first hand impact that dream of hers. By dedicating your support for this very important and special fundraiser, you will provide Casey with the best medical attention available. Each day that goes by we are so very thankful to still have Casey with us. The internal fight that we all have to keep her by our sides and ensure the future she so rightfully deserves will continue to be our mission. Please join us while we continue to give Casey a full life of happiness. We ask you to be loud and proud while using this fundraiser as a battleground to keep fighting for her life. We once again thank you for all of the support and strength you have given our family. Much love and thanks for all the prayers and support, Thank you! <3

For any and all information please contact Kandace Bellofatto at: (443) 280-0237 or kbellofatto@hotmail.com

story:
The Short Story

The village of El Tamarindo is a 400-family community about thirty minutes south of Leon, Nicaragua. The community is plagued by urinary tract infections, which eventually lead to kidney disease and kidney failure. These diseases are caused by the parasites contaminating their rivers and the water delivered to their village via truck. Their only other source is a well that was dug over 10 years ago, but the water from it is too salty and too heavy to drink. These are their only sources of affordable water; none of them are clean.

The HELP International Team Nicaragua is trying to fix this solution, and help give the people of El Tamarindo access to a basic human right: clean water. 

Who is El Tamarindo?

Located about half an hour south of Leon, Nicaragua, the community's main industry is salt mining. Everyone who has a job in the village is involved in salt somehow - mining, packaging, or shipping. The 400 families who live in El Tamarindo suffer from the lack of a basic human need: clean water. These are their options: 

  • Use the water from a 10-year-old well, that is too salty and thick for consumption. 
  • Use the water from the truck that comes that is contaminated with parasites and bacteria. 
  • Use the water from the river, which is also infected with parasites, pollution, and fecal matter from the village upstream. 

Parents are unable to provide their children with any source of clean drinking water. The water truck is supposed to come once a week, but often it won't arrive for weeks at a time. Most people have to turn to the river as their only source of water. 

The river is often used as a place to bathe, wash clothes, go to the bathroom, and play. But the contaminants in the water means that the villagers often get itchy skin after bathing, washing, or playing in the water. The contaminants in the water are also linked to diahrea, dehydration, a fungus that grows on their skin, urinary tract infections, and kidney disease. 

None of their sources of water provide a safe alternative to diharea and disease. 

What is the Project?

HELP Nicaragua is working with a local organization, Mpowering People, to help provide clean water to the 400 families in this community. In and attempt to alleviate these dire circumstances, we are raising $1600  to provide ceramic filters for 60 families and the school. These filters are made in Managua, Nicaragua, and are made out of clay, sawdust, and colloidal silver. They are 99% effective for filtering out contaminants in the water. 

Due to our limited resources, we are targeting families with younger, school-aged children because they are particularly suspectible to the parasites in the water, causing diahrea, which is one of the leading causes of death among this age group of children.

In conjunction with the water filters, we are also holding health workshops, to teach the community methods of water purification such as boiling, or bleaching their water before consumption, to kill the parasites. With your donations, we will be able to give 60 families, including 300 children access to clean water. 

This is our plan:

  • We have created a survey that will help us distinguish the families with the greatest need for the filters, the population with the greatest suspectibility to water-related illness. 
  • We will distribute the survey to the families of Tamarindo and, with the help of our partners at Mpowering People, and select the 60 families that demonstrate the most need and willingness to contribute time and resource to the water sanitation campaign.
  • Recipients will sign a contract, stating that they will care of the filters, as well as pay a $70 cordoba buy-in for the filters (about US $3) that will go towards a fund the benefits all the recipients. 
  • In addition, they are required to attend and bring 2 other participants to the water sanitation workshops for the community.
  • The fund will be mainatined by Mpowering People, and distributed by the committee of community members to those who apply for a US $12 for buying a replacement filter in case it breaks.

We are targeting families: 

  • with children younger than 5 years old
  • with multiple children in the school system
  • with a monthly income of less than $2500 cordoba (about US$107 a month) 
  • and that are willing to support through attendence and bringing 2 other community members to the water sanitation workshops. 

We are working with the local nurse to develop the curriculum about the importance of hydration, and ways to sanitize their water sources through bleaching and boiling, in order to kill the parasites causing illness.

How Can You Help?

No parent should have to live facing the almost certainty that their child will suffer some type of water borne illness; whether it be boughts sickness and diahrea, threatening their livelihood, or whether they may be one of the 'lucky ones' whose fight is postponed until age and prolonged exposure to these parasites and infections has caught up with them, and begins claiming their kidney function. 

A 30 liter filter for $24.85 and can give an entire family the luxury we enjoy everyday: clean drinking water - free of parasites and other harmful contaminates.

Less than $30.00 can help relieve concern, and make a child's future that much brighter. 

This what you can do to help:

  • $1 can promote awareness of this problem, and help correct a basic human necessity. 
  • $12 can provide a replacement filter that can be used for up to 5 years, in case one of the filters break. 
  • $25 can provide a filter for a 5-person family, giving the gift of clean water to children who would otherwise be at risk for kidney disease, urinary tract infections, and other water-related diseases. 
  • $50 can provide two filters for the 150 children of the primary school of El Tamarindo. 
  • $100 can provide four filters for the 300 children of the primary and secondary schools in El Tamarindo. 

 Your support will make a difference!

What More Can You Do?

Money is not the only moving force in this universe. The transfer of knowledge is equally, if not more, important. Please help us raise awareness, so that we can reach anyone that might be interested in blessing a family in need, by: 

  • Sharing this link with family, friends and any acquaintences 
  • Posting this link on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media
  • Telling your friends, family, or workplace about this important cause 

The HELP International Nicaragua Team is grateful for any support that you can give, monetary or otherwise! We appreciate everyone who is willing to contribute or spread the word! 

Follow Our Progress

We will be sharing updates, photos, and videos of the progress of the Water Filter Project on the HELP International Official Nicaragua Blog. You can also sign up for our weekly newsletter via this link.

story:
Daniel's Fund

Many have lost everything to Hurricane Sandy. My brother's house is unlivable, like many in our community of Broad Channel in the Rockaways. Yes, it is still standing but it'll take time, insurance money, and more time to see if they can fix it and to finally fix it.

He needs the necessities

We've put this goal up not knowing exactly how much he'll need. He has a family of 5 with a 2 year old, 3 year old, and a 9 year old. All of his other family has been affected or is out of state/country and due to other circumstances, cannot make it there to help. 

The Impact

As of now, 9 people are living in a one bedroom apartment with no heat or hot water. They were lucky enough to be offered this termporary housing but the winter is coming. They need to start over and keep warm.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please read the update if you would like to donate!

We are also taking donations of clothing and other goods. Here is the list; as of yet, we're not sure of where you can send it but we will post this as soon as possible.

Daniel, age 3- 5t, 12 1/2 shoes, clothes, sweaters, and winter coats
Davin, age 2- 3t, 8-9 shoes, clothes, sweaters, winter coats and size 6 diapers
Saray, age 9- size 6 women's bottoms and large tops
Dan, 42 bottoms and tops XXL or tall tops, warm clothes
Kim, women's size 6, warm clothes


Also, non-perishable food and dog food, BLANKETS, books, toys, cleaning supplies, sturdy garbage bags and gloves, anything else you have to offer.

story:
Our mission

Our mission is to bring natural, healthy and free contraception to every woman in the world and help the couples with efficient family-planning.

Get your money back + earn much more

OPTION 1 - more money

All our perks are based on giving our contributors various service vouchers in much bigger value than the contribution itself. As all vouchers are code-based, you can sell all them e.g. on eBay and get your money back.

E.g. You have time - one-year premium membership has a value of $100, you contribute $5, get 2 vouchers. As this is membership, you can sell it on eBay at least for $30, so you will get at least $60 for your $5 contribution. 

OPTION 2 - faster money

After the project started to generate money, we will establish "investor money pool", where all positive balance money will be (income - costs = balance). If you use your voucher here, you will get back your contribution + 100% + 4% inflation. 

E.g. You want money eartly - you contributed $1000, use your voucher in investor money pool and you will get $2040.

The lowest perks are limited as it is not possible to reward multiple account for one person. 

Investor money pool will be limited to the positive balance at certain time, so e.g. if there will be $1000 in pool and you want $2000, you can will post request, the $1000 will be blocked and if another $1000 will come, you will get paid.

Of course some values as campaigns are base on the amount of users in system, we suppose using the voucher, after one year from start (1M users, every marketing channel has 100K users). If we have less users, the value of campaigns will be lower, otherwise it will be higher. 

The more money we get to start, the faster will be possible to have high value vouchers.

Revolution in contraception begins

After several years of studying researches, gathering the data and testing, we got it. We are going to remove old myths and will give the possibility of natural contraception to every women free of charge including free add-on services, all this is possible thanks to high technology of today.

Why do not use other contraceptions?

  1. Condom
    -not comfortable, not permitted by some religions, failure can be up to 18% (Trussell, 2007), expensive regular use
  2. Hormonal
    -increases risk of breast cancer even with only period of use (Marchbanks, Polly A., et al. 2002) and cervical cancer (Pike, M. C., and D. V. Spicer, 2000; ) especially in later ages of the woman (Kahlenborn, Chris, et al, 2006), changing the natural woman's cycle, also individually may lead to change of moods, body mass and other symptoms, there are long period to get pregnant after using
  3. Cervical cap, diaphragm and other internal barrier methods
    - not comfortable even for women, sensitive to right manipulation, increases risk of infection
  4. Chemical
    - pure chemical content, discomfortable - woman cannot use the soap before and after the usage for some hours, it has limited time period protection, some sexual behavior is not possible

How often is contraception really needed - theory of woman's fertility

  • Human egg can accept sperm in only about a 24 hours period
  • Sperms can survive in womens' reproductive tract for up to 3 days (some sources say 5 days)

So in general, if a woman has 25 days to have a sexual intercourse (excluding 5 days of menstruation from 30 day cycle), only 6 days are really possible of getting pregnant. So the needs of contraception are only 6 days of 25.

Predicting the result

So the only one problem is to predict the ovulation exactly and have some extra days before and after.

Myth busting

With modern technology, you can predict ovulation from / up to

  • temperature - 99,3%
  • LH hormone test - 99%
  • optically from spit - 98%

The more methods you use, the more exact result you get.

Elecronic contraception how to

Temperature prediction is the most exact method, but the devices for the prediction on the market are very expensive (we have one for 600 USD) and the results are limited to the device (no computer connection, no firmware update).

So our goal is to create complex platform, which will work this way:

  1. Woman measure her temperature by
    a) USB / Bluetooth connected thermometer to her smartphone with auto-save
    b) standard thermometer and manually save the result to
    ---- typing to the website
    ---- typing to smartphone application
    ---- sending the SMS (standard, not paid)
  2. After period analysis (2-3 cycles) she has the possibility to know when it is safe to have a sexual intercourse, where it is recommended to abstain or use barrier / chemical contraception and when it is a high risk of getting pregnant. All this information is available:
    a) on the website
    b) on the smartphone application
    c) via SMS (on request or regularly e.g. "send me an SMS, where the fertile period starts)
  3. OPTIONAL - She can use other two methods of predictions additionally to have more exact results - the system will inform her, when to start using LH hormone test and / or optical microscope.

This will lead to a healthy life with natural sexual intercourse.

Get pregnant whenever you want

Of course if a woman knows the fertile days, she can be successfully pregnant much faster than without it.

Woman target group

This project is targeted to women, who

  • like the healthy style of living
  • like the natural barrier-free sexual intercourse
  • cannot use other forms of contraception because of their religion
  • cannot use other forms of contraception because of their health
  • do not want to risk side effect of HC like moods changing, body mass changing, etc.
  • have a permanent partner or use safe sex rules with a casual partner (mainly HIV and other risks testing, loyalty, etc.)
  • do not have money for using other forms of contraception (e.g. third-world countries), but have daily Internet access (at least publicly).
  • want to get pregnant as fast as possible (using the project another way)

Added value - other benefits

Included in basic budget:

  • free access from the Internet, smartphone, SMS
  • semi automatic analysis (if algorithms engage the problem, human will solve that)
  • not-limited historical data
  • data export
  • localization to all main languages (about 30 in the plan now)
  • possibility of buying not common goods as various ovulation testers, HIV / other infections instant tests

If we get more money:

  • free certified gynecologist online 24/7
  • managed forum to discuss "women things"
  • possibility of getting free microscope spit analyzer / LH testers / condoms for fertile days

The business - how to stay free

Thanks to your contributions, we can operate for some limited time (predicted one year), but we have to let the project earns for its own operation. This will be done by

  • Selling services and products hotels, holidays mainly focused on non-fertile days (to enjoy) and wellness, books, etc. for "period" spending in relaxation
  • Selling third party products / services based on the fact we have a lot of women in one place
  • Adsense network
  • Membership levels - it depends on the amount of money getting from the first three possibilities.
    Basic membership will be free maybe with the agreement to get max. one per week SMS and e-mail. 
    Higher membership (paid) will have the possibility to have no adverts, also has prior ity access to the gynecologist (maybe also online with webcam) and possibility to get some free goods (regular or irregular, based on the amount of money)

The budget - what we need for startup

The business plan is projected for 18 months. 6 months of development, alpha and beta testing, 12 months or regular operation.

Also the budget is divided into basic and additional, where the basic one is really needed, additional would help us to offer more free services. 

We really want to develop the project, so we have flexible funding. If we got smaller than the basic budget, we will still develop the project, but it will be difficult and the success will be less possible.

Basic budget - $200,000

  • Technical cloud background (hosting, platform, etc.) for 18 months - $4,000
  • Development for 2 persons for 6 months incl. other expenses - $48,000
  • Operation, continual development 2 persons for 12 months - $72,000
  • SMS interface inbound and outbound incl. messages for 12 months - $6,000
  • Company foundation and maintenance for 12 months - $5,000
  • Localization in 30 languages - $15,000
  • Facebook campaign - $30,000
  • Adwords campaign - $20,000

Additional budget welcome - unlimited :)

  • Gynecologists 24/7 for 12 months - $40,000
  • Forum incl. paid administrators for 12 months - $24,000
  • Free testing goods for women - various
  • Additional promo - various

Offer for contributors

We also want to give you much more than a good feeling, so based on your donation amount, we will give you various services, that can also help you and your business. This includes e.g. premium member voucher, your name and link on our "thanks to" page, linking you on social networks, giving you banner space for a limited time, e-mail campaign, SMS campaign or benefits.

For all perks we need your e-mail address to send you the vouchers!

All values except Premium membership are based on official data from 2013 a predicted total 1M members, where 10% will accept at least one campaign based channel. It is recommended to wait until the system has a reasonable amount of users.
Of course there will be a timeline plan with other conditions as e.g. 1 e-mail campaign per week, etc.

The team

The team is the smallest possible as we can reach out goal with a minimal money spent.

Jan
Yes, that's me :)
I will do everything technical - so resource management, development, integration, etc.

Pavlina
My girlfriend, who helped a lot me in the past few years not even with preparation of this project.
She is a marketing and SEO expert, so this stuff and support as the only women in this project.

Certified gynecologists
Based on the contribution amount to give the possibility of 24/7 service for users.

Contact

If you have any questions, please send them to info@e-contraception.com

Other media we are in

Have a question about the Heavenly Pals Kickstarter project? Discuss Heavenly Pals at Crowdfundingforum.com!

story:
On March 12, 2014 Andrew Mauck, age 30, was rushed to the hospital with severe stroke-like symptoms.  He and his wife, Lauren, are expecting their first child in September.  Andrew was taken to the emergency room at Doctor's Hospital in Sarasota and was later admitted.  Doctors struggled to find the cause of Andrew's symptoms and they ran extensive tests to try to find out what was going on.  He and his wife spent two nights and three days at the hospital.  The final diagnosis was "complicated acephalgic migraine."  A condition which resembles a stroke/TIA, but is caused by the constricting of the vessels in the brain rather than a clot.  He was released on Friday, March 14th.

They are currently "homeless" and staying with his parents.  They had to move out of their apartment (which they are still paying the rent on) because Lauren was continually getting ill.  Chinese drywall is suspected.  Lauren is a Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist and works with Eagle's Wings Counseling Center.  She has dedicated her life to helping other families in times of crisis.  Now we desire to help her and her family in their time of crisis

Lauren and Andrew got medical insurance just before this event occurred.  HOWEVER, they have a $10,000 deductible which they need to meet before anything even gets paid.  They have to pay a percentage of coinsurance after that.  Their medical bills are staggering.  

They are "homeless", pregnant, and overwhelmed with this crisis.  Your gift of $25 or more will go directly to the Mauck's medical fund.  PLEASE help us raise money for this precious couple!

If you are unable to help financially, please pass this on to your social media contacts, your local church, and/or family and friends.  Most importantly, though, please pray for them as they go through this time.

Blessings!
