story:
Short Summary

Ok so here goes nothing... the pic above is of my mom and myself...The reason I am posting is in hopes of being able tosave my mom's life and our home.  My mom had to have a tracheostomy on June 21st, 2012 and we were told at that point when she agreed to have the procedure that medicare would cover for the surgery and the acute rehab after she is transferred from the hospital.  However today we were informed by the hospital social worker that what she had informed of us the week before was not the case.  She told us that the acute care can cost between 35k and 50k a month.  The worst part is that she said that unless we had proof of funds and mom required the extended stay to heal that we would have to give up our home that we have had for over 38 years. 

So a little back story on this wonderful person and why she needs any and all help that we can get.  My mom's name is Barbara Hill and she was born August 3, 1951.  At the age of 9 she ended up with polio.  She spent quite a few years in and out of hospitals and in a body cast for over a year as well as an iron lung.  She overcame this disease and grew to be a beautiful woman with a loving heart who gave birth to two girls.  My mom has been called mom by many people as she was always involved in all of our functions throughout school and she was also a girl scouts leader for many years.  This same amazing woman worked a full time and a part time job to help keep our family together and refused to give up on my sister or myself.  In July of 2005 she had to have major surgery on her neck to repair what was labeled as a swan neck which was the result of the surgeries that had been done to her as a child from the polio.

After mom's surgery in 2005 I stopped working and started to care for her as it became a mostly full time job that although unpaid i was ready and willing to do.  I figured heck she raised me and took care of me so it was time to return the favor.  Her doctors campaigned for her to have this surgery because while her lungs have weakened, her heart and mind and everything else is soo strong.  Everyone at the hospital said that it would be a complete and total shame for someone so strong willed with such a wonderful personality to not be able to continue to live life and she admitted to me herself that she didn't want to die.  She wasn't ready to die but she felt bad for me putting my life on hold for the past 7 years and she didn't want to be a burden to me.  I told her with tears in my eyes that she was never a burden to me and i wasn't ready to let her go if she was willing to fight to live!!!

So now I am at the point of willing to beg and plead with virtual strangers that if you love life and know what it means to love someone so dearly and not want such a strong force to pass on just yet... please please help in anyway that you can.  The current amounts needed arent as of yet set in stone but i do know that the generator that would have to be installed at the house will cost about 10,000 and the vent machine that she would be on at home is also about 10,000.  My main concern is the astronomical amount that they are telling me that the acute rehabilatation is going cost.

To those that can contribute a huge heartfelt thank you and the biggest virtual hug imaginable.  To those that arent able to contribute if it is possible for you to pass this on to others to get the word out wou;ld be amazingly wonderful and huge thanks and hugs to you as well!!!

 

Please help keep a family together and keep their small but happy home :)

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
LORD'S LIGHT

Lord’s Light is a distributor of LED lighting products with a cross filament inside. Our vision is to help the world see the true light, the Lord’s Light, in the hope that sharing His message will bring many people into His Kingdom. Churches and schools can sell our products in fundraising efforts, using the proceeds to support their mission work and capital needs.

PolyBrite’s Borealis Lighting offers breakthrough LED technology beyond that of many other lighting solutions in today’s market. These cross-shaped LED bulbs are 100% green and represent the latest in energy efficiency.

PolyBrite’s patented technology, Borealis Lighting creates smooth, consistent light dispersion and distribution. Through advanced electronics, PolyBrite’s Borealis lamps achieve superior heat management ensuring long life and superior performance. 

Borealis LED lamps match the brightness of conventional incandescent, halogen and fluorescent bulbs, but without any of the hazardous materials such as mercury. The extreme long-life of the LED lighting products, with long-term light consistency of more than 50,000 hours, results in significantly reduced maintenance costs. 

All Borealis lamps are designed to fit into standard fixtures, which simplify the change to LED lighting for energy savings, long life, reduced maintenance, and durability.


Typical Household Chart

The chart below depicts the average amount of money that a typical household would save if they switched to Borealis LED lighting. Total savings over the life time of the bulb is over $43,000 dollars!


General Facts about our A-19 Cross bulb


Fundraising

The Lord’s Light bulb's are available to organizations seeking to raise money for a range of opportunities. Explore the revenue potential of these beautiful bulbs with a cross-shaped filament inside. 

Meet The Team

 Ashley Goeken- President 

 Nick Rodriguez- Director of Finance

story:
Hey there, this is Cindy and Reggie Arlantico. We've been anxiously awaiting the moment we could bring our family chili oil to the public!

We've always been a family of spicy lovers, but we wanted something unique. We grew tired of the vinegar based hot sauces that were on the shelves and wanted something a bit nuttier than the almost sweet flavors of the Asian cuisine chili oils. So a little over ten years ago we embarked on the adventure of creating our own condiment. We knew we wanted something along the lines of a chili oil because it could produce a lot of flavor without having to use stronger ingredients like vinegar. It took more than a half dozen tries, but a little over ten years ago we settled on an absolutely phenomenal flavor.  Ever since then it's been a staple in our family's culinary lifestyle. 

It was only a few years ago that we began sharing it with friends, family, and strangers. Everyone who tried it gave us nothing but raving feedback; saying they found it to be a delicious and flavorful experience. Overtime we got more and more comments about its unique and addictive taste. This led us to the idea of getting it out there on a larger scale.

This led us to crowd funding! We are very attached to the idea that this is a family chili oil and that we want our fans to be a part of that family. We want them to enjoy it like we have, know our story, know us, be a part of the process, and get as excited over the taste as we have. So that's why we are coming to YOU!

Also, if you'd like to follow us elsewhere, here a few helpful links: 

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/RedHotMotorOil

Twitter - https://twitter.com/RedHotMotorOil

Every cent we raise will go toward getting Red Hot Motor Oil out there into the public. Some of the first things we'll be doing if we get funded are:

  • Putting together all pledge rewards and mailing them out as soon as possible. Hopefully this wouldn't take more than a month after the funds get processed.
  • Getting our first run of chili oil manufactured.
  • Build a website where you can purchase the chili oil.
  • Get a food distributing license so we can work booths at festivals and food shows (those booths get expensive!).
  • Manufacture even more Red Hot Motor Oil and work with even more outlets for distribution!

One of our primary goals is to raise enough to allow us to start manufacturing batches to sell to businesses. We have a few owners who would really like to stock our chili oil in their restaurants, but we can't afford to make all that chili oil ourselves. We definitely need help. 

The money will also help us build a website where anybody can go on to purchase jars of Red Hot Motor Oil as well.

We want to use every cent raised to push our chili oil out into the public as much as possible. Rather that be financially aiding us to getting more jars/ingredients so we can hand make batches and sell them at food trucks, outdoor vendors, or even from the back of our Jeep! But it also means putting that money into manufacturing, marketing, final legal processes, and of course - getting rewards out to anyone who helps us out.

We're going to be absolutely transparent with the funding process. We want everyone who backs to be a part of this experience. So if you become a backer you can expect updates every step of the way so you know exactly what's happening behind the scenes!

 Our chili oil's unique taste comes from a dried blend of fresh chiles and other very secret, but completely natural spices. We have to say though, that the chiles we use are the front runner to the flavor party. Their spicy, somewhat nutty taste really adds a burst of flavor that compliments a wide variety of dishes. Mix that in with our spices and oil, and you've got yourself one of the most addictive and delicious flavors out there! It's genuinely so tasty that our family can't help but lick it off the spoon after we drizzle it over our meals.

 Rather it's combined with the savory bite of macaroni and cheese....

...the sweetness of a stack of pancakes...

...the heartiness of bacon & eggs....

....the crunch of a crisp and refreshing salad....

....the comforting taste of a bowl of rice....

...or the grilled juiciness of a chicken breast. We guarantee your first Red Hot Motor Oil experience will be one to remember. You'll want to put it on everything!

We are also 100% gluten and soy free!

Every single dollar counts and no matter how much you donate, we will be in our deepest thanks. We wanted to make sure that 99% of the people who decide to help us out will get an opportunity to try Red Hot Motor Oil though. That's why every single reward tier above $5 will get you some of the chili oil! Along with a couple of extra goodies. 

Keep in mind that you can donate as much or as little as you want. For those that donate specific amounts or more though, you'll get some treats. The reward tiers are as follows: 

$5 - You'll get a Red Hot Motor Oil sticker.

$10 - You'll receive your very own 2oz jar of Red Hot Motor oil and a sticker. 

$15 - A 4oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil and a sticker.

$25 - A 4oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, a sticker, and a RHMO magnet. 

$50 - A 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, a sticker, and a magnet. 

$100 - A 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, sticker, magnet, and a reusable grocery bag. 

$500 - You will receive one 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil every single month (shipped to you by us for free) for an entire year. Plus the magnet, sticker, and grocery bag! 

"Red Hot Motor Oil's deep, roasty, chile flavors, and balanced heat & lingering nuttiness make it an excellent addition to any salad, grain or pasta-based dish! I highly recommend it!" - Andrew DiDonato, Chef/Owner of Michelangelo's Pizza + Beer in Fullerton, CA

"I tried Red Hot Motor Oil on a Choice Rib Eye. It enhanced the steak from the grill to the plate and added that something extra to make an everyday steak into a gourmet Steak House entree! I can't wait to try it on all my favorite dishes!" - Michael W., Manager of Ralph's in Fullerton, CA

"This was so good! I remember my friend bringing this to class in 8th grade. 5 stars, easy!" - Andre Booth

"This is awesome! Used some in my Marinara sauce and in some pimento cheese. Really gives it a kick up! Spices are so balanced and just the right amount of heat, but not too much. I love it!" - Kim-Freels Martin

"I got a jar today. I tried it! Here is what happened...I made white chicken enchiladas, boiled my chicken to shred. As I was shredding it, I decided to put a little of the Red Hot Motor Oil on a plate and dipped my chicken in it. Well, I almost ate too much chicken!!!! Then I found my self adding a little to my rice, then in my white sauce! It's what I would call the Grippo effect, they are hot, but you can't quit eating them! Next will try on the ice cream!!!! Pretty Damn Good!" - RHMO fan

"Smelling a new product for the first time is quite revealing…then comes tasting it. It was like the Fourth of July on my tastebuds!! Red Hot Motor Oil is an awesome experience! My college student son said this: "As I was eating Red Hot Motor Oil for the first time, all I could think was…I WANT MORE!!!" - Dianne Capp

"The product is good! It is a very cool idea!" - Gennaro Pecchia

                                                  - Risks & Challenges -

As with any publicly funded project, there are risks involved. Maybe there's a hiccup on the production line, maybe the flavor isn't quite what we wanted once it gets produced, maybe the manufacture’s warehouse gets taken over in a hostile alien invasion. There are handfuls of things that could happen, but it doesn't mean they will. If they do though, we will make sure that people get their rewards as soon as possible. We will also be very honest with any shortcomings or sudden turn of events.
story_txt: Hey there, this is Cindy and Reggie Arlantico. We've been anxiously awaiting the moment we could bring our family chili oil to the public!We've always been a family of spicy lovers, but we wanted something unique. We grew tired of the vinegar based hot sauces that were on the shelves and wanted something a bit nuttier than the almost sweet flavors of the Asian cuisine chili oils. So a little over ten years ago we embarked on the adventure of creating our own condiment. We knew we wanted something along the lines of a chili oil because it could produce a lot of flavor without having to use stronger ingredients like vinegar. It took more than a half dozen tries, but a little over ten years ago we settled on an absolutely phenomenal flavor.  Ever since then it's been a staple in our family's culinary lifestyle. It was only a few years ago that we began sharing it with friends, family, and strangers. Everyone who tried it gave us nothing but raving feedback; saying they found it to be a delicious and flavorful experience. Overtime we got more and more comments about its unique and addictive taste. This led us to the idea of getting it out there on a larger scale.This led us to crowd funding! We are very attached to the idea that this is a family chili oil and that we want our fans to be a part of that family. We want them to enjoy it like we have, know our story, know us, be a part of the process, and get as excited over the taste as we have. So that's why we are coming to YOU!Also, if you'd like to follow us elsewhere, here a few helpful links: Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/RedHotMotorOilTwitter - https://twitter.com/RedHotMotorOilEvery cent we raise will go toward getting Red Hot Motor Oil out there into the public. Some of the first things we'll be doing if we get funded are:Putting together all pledge rewards and mailing them out as soon as possible. Hopefully this wouldn't take more than a month after the funds get processed.Getting our first run of chili oil manufactured.Build a website where you can purchase the chili oil.Get a food distributing license so we can work booths at festivals and food shows (those booths get expensive!).Manufacture even more Red Hot Motor Oil and work with even more outlets for distribution!One of our primary goals is to raise enough to allow us to start manufacturing batches to sell to businesses. We have a few owners who would really like to stock our chili oil in their restaurants, but we can't afford to make all that chili oil ourselves. We definitely need help. The money will also help us build a website where anybody can go on to purchase jars of Red Hot Motor Oil as well.We want to use every cent raised to push our chili oil out into the public as much as possible. Rather that be financially aiding us to getting more jars/ingredients so we can hand make batches and sell them at food trucks, outdoor vendors, or even from the back of our Jeep! But it also means putting that money into manufacturing, marketing, final legal processes, and of course - getting rewards out to anyone who helps us out.We're going to be absolutely transparent with the funding process. We want everyone who backs to be a part of this experience. So if you become a backer you can expect updates every step of the way so you know exactly what's happening behind the scenes! Our chili oil's unique taste comes from a dried blend of fresh chiles and other very secret, but completely natural spices. We have to say though, that the chiles we use are the front runner to the flavor party. Their spicy, somewhat nutty taste really adds a burst of flavor that compliments a wide variety of dishes. Mix that in with our spices and oil, and you've got yourself one of the most addictive and delicious flavors out there! It's genuinely so tasty that our family can't help but lick it off the spoon after we drizzle it over our meals. Rather it's combined with the savory bite of macaroni and cheese.......the sweetness of a stack of pancakes......the heartiness of bacon & eggs........the crunch of a crisp and refreshing salad........the comforting taste of a bowl of rice.......or the grilled juiciness of a chicken breast. We guarantee your first Red Hot Motor Oil experience will be one to remember. You'll want to put it on everything!We are also 100% gluten and soy free!Every single dollar counts and no matter how much you donate, we will be in our deepest thanks. We wanted to make sure that 99% of the people who decide to help us out will get an opportunity to try Red Hot Motor Oil though. That's why every single reward tier above $5 will get you some of the chili oil! Along with a couple of extra goodies. Keep in mind that you can donate as much or as little as you want. For those that donate specific amounts or more though, you'll get some treats. The reward tiers are as follows: $5 - You'll get a Red Hot Motor Oil sticker.$10 - You'll receive your very own 2oz jar of Red Hot Motor oil and a sticker. $15 - A 4oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil and a sticker.$25 - A 4oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, a sticker, and a RHMO magnet. $50 - A 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, a sticker, and a magnet. $100 - A 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil, sticker, magnet, and a reusable grocery bag. $500 - You will receive one 8oz jar of Red Hot Motor Oil every single month (shipped to you by us for free) for an entire year. Plus the magnet, sticker, and grocery bag! "Red Hot Motor Oil's deep, roasty, chile flavors, and balanced heat & lingering nuttiness make it an excellent addition to any salad, grain or pasta-based dish! I highly recommend it!" - Andrew DiDonato, Chef/Owner of Michelangelo's Pizza + Beer in Fullerton, CA"I tried Red Hot Motor Oil on a Choice Rib Eye. It enhanced the steak from the grill to the plate and added that something extra to make an everyday steak into a gourmet Steak House entree! I can't wait to try it on all my favorite dishes!" - Michael W., Manager of Ralph's in Fullerton, CA"This was so good! I remember my friend bringing this to class in 8th grade. 5 stars, easy!" - Andre Booth"This is awesome! Used some in my Marinara sauce and in some pimento cheese. Really gives it a kick up! Spices are so balanced and just the right amount of heat, but not too much. I love it!" - Kim-Freels Martin"I got a jar today. I tried it! Here is what happened...I made white chicken enchiladas, boiled my chicken to shred. As I was shredding it, I decided to put a little of the Red Hot Motor Oil on a plate and dipped my chicken in it. Well, I almost ate too much chicken!!!! Then I found my self adding a little to my rice, then in my white sauce! It's what I would call the Grippo effect, they are hot, but you can't quit eating them! Next will try on the ice cream!!!! Pretty Damn Good!" - RHMO fan"Smelling a new product for the first time is quite revealing…then comes tasting it. It was like the Fourth of July on my tastebuds!! Red Hot Motor Oil is an awesome experience! My college student son said this: "As I was eating Red Hot Motor Oil for the first time, all I could think was…I WANT MORE!!!" - Dianne Capp"The product is good! It is a very cool idea!" - Gennaro Pecchia                                                  - Risks & Challenges -As with any publicly funded project, there are risks involved. Maybe there's a hiccup on the production line, maybe the flavor isn't quite what we wanted once it gets produced, maybe the manufacture’s warehouse gets taken over in a hostile alien invasion. There are handfuls of things that could happen, but it doesn't mean they will. If they do though, we will make sure that people get their rewards as soon as possible. We will also be very honest with any shortcomings or sudden turn of events.

story:
TraqMe provides powerful insights from the daily glucose measurements to patients and caregivers. By text messages we remind them to measure blood sugar and capture the values. We transform these into insights and provide them in mobile and responsive forms.

TraqMe reúne datos clave para las personas viviendo con diabetes y los conecta con doctores y familiares. Mediante mensajes de texto, envía recordatorios para medir los niveles de glucosa y almacena los valores, otorgando un seguimiento preciso y personalizado de la progresión de la salud diaria. TraqMe entrega un análisis detallado de los datos en dispositivos móviles y en la web.

TraqMe thereby does not require any Appstore downloads, expensive bluetooth devices or even owning a smartphone!

La ventaja de TraqMe es que no requiere descargar ninguna aplicación o conectarse con dispositivos Bluetooth costosos. ¡Ni siquiera se necesita un smartphone!

We're a team with over 30 years of healthcare, innovation and business experience. We have all met through Digital Health challenges and hackathons in Silicon Valley.

Nuestro equipo tiene más de 30 años de experiencia en los sectores de salud, innovación y desarrollo de negocios. Nos conocimos en eventos para mejorar la salud a través de dispositivos digitales y competencias para desarrolladores en Silicon Valley.

After our automated solution was recognized by Novartis last year, we expanded on our passion and built TebiaMed:  A platform that brings simple tools to the hands of patients, doctors and caregivers.


Después de que nuestra solución de envío de mensajes automatizados fuera reconocida por Novartis el año pasado, decidimos transformar nuestra pasión en una plataforma a la que nombramos TebiaMed. El desarrollo de TebiaMed nos permitió idear TraqMe: una plataforma simple, al alcance de todos, que reúne información y conecta a las personas que viven con diabetes con sus familiares y doctores.

 

Text.Track.Transform

Tres pasos: SMS . Segumiento. Transforma. 

We are raising funds for a new product called TraqMe, inspired by my wife's journey with chronic disease and self monitoring. After being diagnosed with Type II Diabetes, she had to adopt to some major daily behavioral changes such as measuring her blood sugar, writing it down in a log book, remembering to take her Metformin, and following strict dietary restrictions.  She had to do all that while withstanding the newly found foot pains after walking up small hills or even regular activities.

La idea de TraqMe derivó de la experiencia de uno de los fundadores del equipo: Atta. Cuando su esposa fue diagnosticada con diabetes tipo 2, tuvieron la necesidad de realizar enormes cambios en sus estilos de vida. Desde los alimentos que consumían, hasta la manera en la que daban seguimiento al día a día. Tenían que recordar cuándo era hora de tomar sus medicamentos, qué tipo de comida podía o no comer y escribir todo esto en papel, para después llevarlo al médico y que éste pudiese analizar los resultados.

There are 347 Million other people who fight Diabetes in the world, with burdens varying from high costs to fatal complications. It is a self-management disease and you can't manage what you can't see.

Mantener un control estricto sobre estos datos es complicado para los 374 millones de personas viviendo con diabetes. A veces, las actividades diarias impiden mantener un seguimiento detallado de la alimentación, medicamentos y glucosa en sangre. TraqMe facilita el mantener un control adecuado sobre los padecimientos crónicos, en específico la diabetes tipo 2.

There are over 10 Million Diabetics in the USA alone who do not own a smartphone but have a normal mobile phone. Furthermore, almost 80% of deaths due to to Diabetes occurs in developing countries, where smartphone penetration is far less.

Nuestra plataforma simplifica el proceso de recaudación e interpretación de los patrones diarios. Sólo en Estados Unidos hay más de 10 millones de personas con diabetes que no cuentan con un smartphone. Es por ello que, al basar nuestro sistema en mensajes de texto, facilitamos el manejo de la diabetes.


 Why Indiegogo and why do we need Crowd Funding?

Between us, we have started 7 different companies and we are all excited to try out crowdfunding a business for the first time.

TraqMe se fundamenta en un equipo de emprendedores que ha creado al menos 7 compañías. Esta vez decidimos iniciar nuestro proyecto mediante una campaña de Crowd Funding.



As a team, we've decided to raise $5,000 to launch TraqMe as a Pilot Project . We plan on using this funding to:

This is the first milestone which we will use for the following over a timespan of 3 months:

1-  Customize and develop the product for community services and ACOs for Pilot.

2-  Tracking costs for over 1,000 patients.

3-  Registering as B- Corporation which is a new community of businesses which which harnesses the power of private enterprise to create public benefit. It is purpose-driven, and creates benefit for all stakeholders, not just shareholders.www.bcorporation.net

Nuestra meta es reunir $5,000 dólares para lanzar TraqMe como un proyecto piloto. El dinero que recaudemos se enfocará en:


1. Desarrollar y personalizar el producto para servicios comunitarios y  para organizaciones enfocadas en proveer servicios de pago y cuidado a pacientes (Accountable Care Organization).

2. Dar seguimiento al menos a 1, 000 pacientes.

3. Registrarnos como una corporación bajo la forma B-Corporation. Este tipo de organización tiene como objetivo generar beneficios públicos. Debe estar sustentada en un propósito social y debe generar beneficios a la comunidad, no sólo a los socios. Más información enwww.bcorporation.net

If we do pass our target in the first half of the campaign we will add further milestones from our future vision.

This simplicity makes our technology accessible to diabetics all over the world.

We are leveraging the existing glucose readers that diabetics use by a simple SMS interface to gather glucose readings and then providing them, their doctors and their caregivers with actionable graphical trends and comparisons.

Si superamos nuestra meta de recaudación podremos proveer servicio a más pacientes e iremos agregando más objetivos clave. 

Al simplificar la adquisición de datos, hacemos un producto más accesible, complementando los dispositivos de medición de glucosa. Proporcionamos una interfaz de mensaje de texto y conectar los niveles diarios con médicos y con los familiares, en forma de gráficos y análisis comparativos.



This is how it works:

1)  Trends based on simple texting:

The patient receives an SMS reminder to measure their glucose and they text it as a reply. TraqMe then responds with 3-day, weekly and monthly trends.

2)  Family Re-enforcement:

The patient’s family can then follow the progress no matter where they are and know what is happening with their loved ones, regardless of location and time zone.

3)  Meaningful Reporting for the Doctor’s visit:

When the doctor’s follow-up day comes, the patient would have easily created a complete graph of historical measurements, which the doctor can use to assess the progress and adjust medications.

4)  Being part of a community:

TraqMe users can communicate with others in their local area to share ideas, educational videos and create group events.


Así funciona TraqMe:

1)  Tendencias basadas en mensajes de texto simples (SMS)

El paciente recibe un recordatorio SMS para medir su glucosa y responder al mensaje con su nivel. TraqMe responde con las tendencias de los últimos 3 días, de la última semana y tendencias mensuales acumuladas.

2) Apoyo familiar

Los familiares de la persona viviendo con diabetes pueden seguir la progresión, sin importar en dónde estén. Esto les permite saber la condición y la salud de sus seres queridos, sin importar su ubicación o la hora.

3)  Reportes detallados en las citas con el médico

Al asistir a la consulta de seguimiento con el médico, TraqMe provee una serie de gráficos y datos históricos de gran valor para el especialista, lo cual permite valorar el progreso del padecimiento y ajustar los medicamentos en caso de ser necesario.

4)  Generar comunidades

Los usuarios de TraqMe se pueden comunicar con otros usuarios alrededor de ellos, permitiéndoles compartir ideas, videos educacionales y crear eventos.


                         Our Story - Nuestra historia


October 2013

- Initiated project at Health 2.0 Hackathon- Developed unique patient follow up mechanism

- Berkeley Healthcare Challenge: Idea of caregiver and patient web-based portal.

- Novartis Heart Failure Challenge: Winners - Modified SMS tool to provide doctors with an algorithm that helped doctors identify heart patients at risk.

Octubre 2013

  • Iniciamos el proyecto en el concurso de Health 2.0 Hackathon.

    • Desarrollamos un mecanismo para dar seguimiento a pacientes

  • Berkeley Healthcare Challenge

    • Desarrollamos la idea de generar comunidades y conexiones entre familiares y pacientes mediante un portal web.

  • Ganadores del Novartis Heart Failure Challenge

    • Modificamos la herramienta de automatización SMS para entregar a los médicos con un algoritmo que ayudara a identificar a pacientes con factores cardiacos de riesgo.



November 2013

- National Science Foundation I Corp: Business concept validation by interviewing 70 caregivers.

Noviembre 2013

  • National Science Foundation I Corp

    • Validamos nuestro concepto de negocio al entrevistar a 70 proveedores del sector salud.


DreamForce 2013

  • Competencia en el Hackathon de Salesforce


January 2014

- Created tracking and education system for Total Knee Replacement surgeries as a prototype for Dignity Health and BOX Challenge

See our Video at : http://www.tebiamed.org/index.html

-  Showcased our platform in the HIMSS Silicon Valley Innovation & Technology Summit

Enero 2014

  • Creamos un sistema de seguimiento y educación para la compañía Total Knee Replacement surgeries, como prototipo para Dignity Health and BOX Challenge

Pueden ver nuestro video en:http://www.tebiamed.org/index.html

  • Mostramos nuestra plataforma en HIMSS Silicon Valley Innovation & Technology Summit



March 2014:

-  Applied for a Provisional IP for the product.

Marzo 2014

  • Aplicación para registro de propiedad intelectual provisional

April 2014:

- Indiegogo Campaign: Apply TraqMe tools for diabetic communities through pilot projects.

Abril 2014:

  • Campaña en Indiegogo



Future Outlook:

-  Pilot Project Implementation

-  Develop our algorithms further to provide more meaningful data

-  Expand to other patient communities

Metas a futuro:

  1. Implementación del proyecto piloto.

  2. Adaptar nuestros algoritmos para entregar información aún más detallada.

  3. Extender nuestro servicio a comunidades en otros países.

We appreciate all of your support in helping us spread the word about our campaign. Please share our site with your friends and give us a shout out on Facebook and Twitter!

Agradecemos su apoyo para nuestro proyecto. Compartan nuestra historia con sus amigos y familias. Pueden seguir nuestro trayecto en Facebook y Twitter.

story:
A Survivor is Born!

When Jayraiah's mother was four months pregnant she began to bleed. She was told by the doctors that her baby had died in the womb. However, after a second examination, the doctors discovered that there was a second baby! Little Jayraiah was alive and the immense despair of a miscarriage was replaced by the overwhelming joy of an unexpected birth! 

Jayraiah was born healthy and happy and ready to enjoy all that life had to offer. It was not long after her birth that a small red dot appeared on her nose. It grew bigger and bigger and began to swell. Soon her entire nose was painfully swollen and red. It was diagnosed as infantile hemangioma. Although many cases of hemangioma slowly disappear over time, Jayraiah's nose has gotten so bad that it will never be the same without treatment.  


What She Needs

Dr. Levitin says "I would be glad to work with you and determine a way to get this child the necessary care.  First, this is a very difficult nasal hemangioma; while most of the hemangioma can be removed in one surgery, these typically require a second surgery about 6 mos apart.  The first surgery would be to debulk the hemangioma and approximate the landmarks; then a second surgery to refine and restore the nose to proper size and shape. I would prefer if she can stay for a week after each surgery, as Ican also remove the sutures and perform laser to the residual red skinto help treat this as well, as some of the red skin will fade overtime, but the overall size of this vascular tumor will not go away on its own."

            "The estimated costs for all treatments (2 surgeries, 2 lasers, 2
            hospital/OR fees, and follow up) will cost approximately $30,000."


                                           The Breakdown

                             2 Surgeries and Follow Up=$30,000

              2 Round Trip Flights from the Philippines to NYC= $7,000

                               Food and/or necessities= $1,500

 

How will the Funds be Used?

100% of the funds raised will go to Jayraiah's travel and treatment. If we meet our goal and raise the money necessary for the surgery, the remaining funds will be placed in a fund for her education.

The Impact


The impact is that Jayraiah will be able to live a normal life free of the discomfort and pain of her condition. Jayraiah lives in a very poor area and "there is literally no one over there that can treat her."

Your donation will help change a little girl's life forever. 

Without your help, Jayraiah WILL NOT get surgery or treatment for her nose...ever. 


                                   A Little Bit of Sunshine

                               She's a little bit of sunshine,
                             She's a smile to light your days,
                               She will steal your heart and 
                           keep it with her warm endearing ways,
                           She's your precious little daughter,
                               With a sweetness from above
                           Who will fill your years with laughter
                              and your lives with lots of love


I don't have the money to donate, what else can I do?

Share. Share. Share. 

Even if your friends don't donate, infantile hemangioma is something that many people do not know about. Spreading awareness about what it is and the wonderful people that experience it will help curtail the teasing and taunting that is often associated with cuties like Jayraiah.
story_txt: A Survivor is Born!When Jayraiah's mother was four months pregnant she began to bleed. She was told by the doctors that her baby had died in the womb. However, after a second examination, the doctors discovered that there was a second baby! Little Jayraiah was alive and the immense despair of a miscarriage was replaced by the overwhelming joy of an unexpected birth! Jayraiah was born healthy and happy and ready to enjoy all that life had to offer. It was not long after her birth that a small red dot appeared on her nose. It grew bigger and bigger and began to swell. Soon her entire nose was painfully swollen and red. It was diagnosed as infantile hemangioma. Although many cases of hemangioma slowly disappear over time, Jayraiah's nose has gotten so bad that it will never be the same without treatment.  What She NeedsDr. Levitin says "I would be glad to work with you and determine a way to get this child the necessary care.  First, this is a very difficult nasal hemangioma; while most of the hemangioma can be removed in one surgery, these typically require a second surgery about 6 mos apart.  The first surgery would be to debulk the hemangioma and approximate the landmarks; then a second surgery to refine and restore the nose to proper size and shape. I would prefer if she can stay for a week after each surgery, as Ican also remove the sutures and perform laser to the residual red skinto help treat this as well, as some of the red skin will fade overtime, but the overall size of this vascular tumor will not go away on its own."            "The estimated costs for all treatments (2 surgeries, 2 lasers, 2            hospital/OR fees, and follow up) will cost approximately $30,000."                                           The Breakdown                             2 Surgeries and Follow Up=$30,000              2 Round Trip Flights from the Philippines to NYC= $7,000                               Food and/or necessities= $1,500 How will the Funds be Used?100% of the funds raised will go to Jayraiah's travel and treatment. If we meet our goal and raise the money necessary for the surgery, the remaining funds will be placed in a fund for her education.The ImpactThe impact is that Jayraiah will be able to live a normal life free of the discomfort and pain of her condition. Jayraiah lives in a very poor area and "there is literally no one over there that can treat her."Your donation will help change a little girl's life forever. Without your help, Jayraiah WILL NOT get surgery or treatment for her nose...ever.                                    A Little Bit of Sunshine                               She's a little bit of sunshine,                             She's a smile to light your days,                               She will steal your heart and                            keep it with her warm endearing ways,                           She's your precious little daughter,                               With a sweetness from above                           Who will fill your years with laughter                              and your lives with lots of loveI don't have the money to donate, what else can I do?Share. Share. Share. Even if your friends don't donate, infantile hemangioma is something that many people do not know about. Spreading awareness about what it is and the wonderful people that experience it will help curtail the teasing and taunting that is often associated with cuties like Jayraiah.

story: Stella Rose Davis was born on February 18th at 11:49 PM with multiple internal problems. After emergency surgery to repair holes in her stomach, she remains sedated in ICU fighting kidney failure while a machine breathes for her. We know the miracle is coming, but waiting for that miracle is an emotional struggle. Please help Stella's parents avoid the financial struggle that goes with it. This money will be used for food and lodging and the missed work time as they stay by their baby's side while God heals her.
story_txt: Stella Rose Davis was born on February 18th at 11:49 PM with multiple internal problems. This money will be used for food and lodging and the missed work time as they stay by their baby's side while God heals her.

story:
Армейци, 



През последните 2 седмици ние ръководството и вие феновете бяхме свидетели на един добре планиран ЦИРК или както го нарекоха определени хора ФАРС. 
Този фарс обаче не беше дело на Александър Томов и Александър Тодоров, както някои хора се опитват да ви убедят.Ще започнем да разказваме историята от самото начало. 


През Юли 2013 г. нашият любим отбор беше пред закриване. „Титаните” решиха, че повече няма да издържат ЦСКА след 5 години на безобразно управление, което остави след себе си клуба с милиони левове задължения и стотици висящи дела за неизплатени ангажименти, поети и разписвани от същите тези „Титани”. Беше подаден отказ от участие в европейските клубни турнири и беше подготвено писмо за прекратяване участието на ЦСКА в А Група. Всички футболисти се бяха разбягали и реално ЦСКА нямаше отбор. Няколко пъти „Титаните” се опитаха да прехвърлят кашата, която бяха забъркали на различни хора – Гриша Ганчев, Христо Стоичков, но всеки, виждайки батака, в който трябваше да влезе, бързо се отказваше. Тогава се появиха Александър Томов, Александър Тодорор и Стойчо Младенов – единствените хора готови да се нагърбят с тежката задача да спасят ЦСКА от неизбежен фалит и ликвидация. 


През последните две години срещу тези лица – Томов, Тодоров, Младенов -  се изляха тонове помия, както от врагове, така и от „цесекари”. Истината е обаче, че през тези две години ЦСКА го имаше! ЦСКА се бореше със зъби и нокти във всеки мач! В ЦСКА се плащаха заплати! ЦСКА продаваше футболисти! ЦСКА имаше лиценз! ЦСКА погасяваше стари задължения! ЦСКА беше единственият реален конкурент на едно отборче познато като „Каузата”. С две думи – ЦСКА беше неудобен! 

Силите на Томов и Тодоров да поддържат съществуването на клуба и да погасяват стари задължения обаче не са безкрайни. За тези две години, освен приходите на клуба от оперативната му дейност в ЦСКА са влезли още 5.2 милиона лева директно от мажоритарния акционер. В стремежа си да продължат развитието на клуба, Томов и Тодоров се обърнаха към други видни бизнесмени с молба да инвестират и да помогнат на ЦСКА. Сами нямаше как да се справят! Така се появиха семействата Манджукови и Инджови. Те предоставиха на клуба финансова подкрепа като в замяна поискаха голяма част от акциите на ЦСКА в залог. Бяха им предоставени! 


И ето, че достигаме до събитията от последните седмици. От два месеца насам сегашното ръководство на ЦСКА предоставя на семействата Манджукови и Инджови пълна информация за състоянието на клуба. Това се прави на база публично поет ангажимент от господата за придобиване на мажоритарния дял акции на ЦСКА и бъдещата издръжка на клуба. В най-трудния период от годината – лицензирането, те поеха публичен ангажимент пред всички вас феновете да погасят всички задължения, свързани с лиценза, както и да се нагърбят с текущите разходи и управление на клуба. Изведнъж, 5 дни преди неизбежното придобиване на  мажоритарния дял акции от тях,  пуснаха декларация – ОТКАЗВАМЕ СЕ! 
Ръководствотото на ЦСКА няма как да не вижда в тези нерационални действия преднамерен саботаж на ЦСКА! Опит ЦСКА да бъде премахнат! На кого пречи силен ЦСКА? Вие знаете! Стойчо Младенов беше жертва на тази атака! Следващата жертва ще е лиценза, защото атаката беше планирана и изпълнена така, че Томов и Тодоров  да нямат достатъчно време да намерят алтернатива. Затова отново се обръщаме към вас феновете. Вие, които страдате най-много за любимия отбор, а в същото време давате най-много за ЦСКА. Вие сте единствените, които могат да застанат зад клуба в поредния тежък момент. 
От днес стартираме кампания по сабиране на средства за спасяването на лиценза на ЦСКА. Необходимата сума е 1 000 000 лв. Много от вас все още имат средтсва по сметки в ЕЛАНА или други инвестиционни посредници, които бяхте готови да дадете за ЦСКА. Сега ЦСКА има нужда от тях! Спешно, неотложно, в рамките на само няколко дни до 31-ви Март. Всеки, който желае да помогне за спасяването на лиценза на ЦСКА, може да направи дарение  с


Титуляр: ЦСКА ИНВЕСТМЪНТ ЕООД*/CSKA INVESTMENT Ltd 

Основание: Дарение за лиценз


Фирмата ЦСКА ИНВЕСТМЪНТ ЕООД е 100% собственост на ПФК ЦСКА АД. Това може да се провери от всеки на интернет страницата на Търговския регистър. Ние, ръководството, ще направим всичко по силите си, за да не допуснем разпадането на ЦСКА, както сме го правили всеки ден през последните 2 години! Но сами може и да не се справим!


Време е феновете на ЦСКА наистина да се обединят като един юмрук и да тропнат по масата заявявайки в един глас – НЯМА ДА СЕ ПРЕДАДЕМ! 
В заключение, искаме да използваме тази трибуна, за да попитаме открито какво ще направят за ЦСКА семействата Манджукови и Инджови или, както трябва вече да ги наричаме – новите главни акционери в клуба. Защото на 31-ви март те ще притежават над 60% от акциите на ЦСКА. Томов и Тодоров са готови да помагат! Феновете са готови да помагат! Вие какво ще направите???

Прочети повече на: http://www.sportal.bg/news.php?news=539581

story:
Tweet Rocket completely takes care of your Twitter campaign, leaving you to focus on your business

Featured on:

Tweet Rocket is a powerful social media service for organically growing your Twitter audience, with the backing of an expert social media team. This is it, in a nutshell:



What makes it different from any other social media tool, is that there is a real, human team of digital marketing experts who set up your campaign to work effectively no matter what industry you’re in.


Working prototype

In November 2014 we built an internal prototype of Tweet Rocket and launched it to the public as a proof of concept.

Worldwide signups

So far we’ve had customers sign up in over 6 countries, including:

Our customer base spans across over 12 sectors, including:


What people are saying:


Developed at the Sussex Innovation Centre at the University of Sussex

Tweet Rocket is being developed in Brighton; the 'silicon valley' of the UK. At the heart of it is The Sussex Innovation Centre, where we're based. Mike Herd is the executive director here and he shares his thoughts on Tweet Rocket so far...



We use basic information about your business when you sign up and immediately begin building your campaign. Upon going live, Tweet Rocket completely takes care of the following activities:


We always play nice with Twitter. So our team manually take care of:


...and of course:


We do deep research into your brand and industry niche, to ensure that we’re tweeting relevant and engaging content to your followers. We use feeds from around the web and create some of our own, so that we can tweet out the following types of content to your customers:



Automatically inserts relevant hashtags

Tweet Rocket automatically finds and replaces keywords with popular hashtags as well as adds relevant hashtags to the end of your tweets for maximum exposure and more growth.


After only a few months, we’re seeing excellent growth across all of our campaigns. The rate of growth varies depending on your industry.

Here are just some examples:





Clean and simple to use

We've made Tweet Rocket super clear and user-friendly unlike most other tools available. We designed the dashboard in a way that is easy enough for 'our parents' to use, yet advanced enough that us as a digital marketing agency can take full advantage of its capabilities.


Your own Tweet Rocket assistant

Tweet Rocket doesn't let you fend for yourself. So to make things even simpler, we're giving you your very own social media assistant, who will provide you with tips and assistance on anything that will help improve your account. 

Advanced feed finder

Our advanced feed finder lets you enter some basic keywords around your niche, which then automatically finds you high authority and powerful feeds that produce great content for your Twitter account and your followers.



Built for resellers

We've built Tweet Rocket with resellers in mind. Our customers are already reselling Tweet Rocket to their clients with a healthy markup and they've given us invaluable feedback on how Tweet Rocket should allow them to effectively manage their clients.

Customers are already reselling


Manage your account from anywhere

Tweet Rocket looks and feels great on every device. Monitor your campaign growth or make changes to your campaign on the go at any time.



Tweet Rocket Score - A measure of quality

As part of the beta, we have developed our own algorithm which scores all Twitter users on the quality of their account. To help score users, we look at factors like tweet activity, age of account, following/followers ratio and much more.

We use this score to suggest users to follow and unfollow, which we recommend to do on a daily basis. On certain packages, our team will do this for you, meaning you can take an entirely hands-off approach to your campaign if you wish.


Campaign timeline

We strive to deploy your campaign within 24-48 hours from sign up. Below is what a typical campaign timeline looks like:




We are Wonderlabs, a small digital marketing agency in Brighton (UK) and we’ve taken everything we’ve learnt over the past 8 years and created Tweet Rocket.

We’re using our wealth of experience of delivering successful marketing campaigns to our clients and packaged it up into a hybrid service to empower businesses all over the world to take advantage of social media no matter what their capabilities are, what their budget is or how much time they have.


The people behind the magic


Tweet Rocket is for anyone looking to grow their audience on Twitter without the time or knowhow to tweet interesting and engaging content to their existing followers. We’re making Tweet Rocket competitive and affordable for businesses of all sizes and hobbyists alike.

We recommend Tweet Rocket if you are a:



Right now, Tweet Rocket is still a side project as we still have existing clients whose digital marketing campaigns we manage. Getting funding would allow us to realise our dream and make the transition from a digital marketing agency helping dozens of businesses, to full-time Tweet Rocketeers, helping millions.Design and development for customer dashboard (with oAuth)

Funding will pay for design, development and testing costs for our most requested feature: a customer-facing, powerful dashboard. One that would give customers complete flexibility and control over their campaigns. By using Twitter oAuth, the dashboard will be fully integrated with Twitter’s API, which also makes signing up even simpler.

Full-time scalable team

The new version of Tweet Rocket will be more accessible, more affordable and quicker to sign up. With this in mind, we expect an increase in new customers. As all campaigns are setup manually by our team, more customers will require a larger team to setup the new campaigns. Funding will help us do this. Our goal is to also decrease the setup time from 48 hours to within 24 hours, so customer campaigns are up and running even quicker.

Improved infrastructure

Tweet Rocket currently runs across 4 local servers and is expensive to scale. We also have to pause campaigns in order to make adjustments to them. Funding would allow for scalable, secure and stable cloud hosting, making the platform more sustainable and wiping out any campaign downtime.

First-class customer support

Most of our time is spent carrying out our day to day work, whilst trying to set up new campaigns and maintain high levels of customer support for Tweet Rocket customers. Super difficult with multiple time zones!

With funding, we would be able to significantly reduce customer support time, whilst increasing customer satisfaction. We’ll be integrating systems like Intercom to ensure that feedback and support is always on hand, right within the dashboard.


We'll have a special beta version of Tweet Rocket for backers to use in June 2015. We'll get feedback from you and implement changes and suggestions and follow up with a full public release in late Summer 2015. All backers will get early access ahead of a public release.



We're giving away some great perks for you to enjoy when you contribute, including huge savings on Tweet Rocket subscriptions.

On the top perk, we're reserving 5 spots in our super secret global marketing campaign, where we're producing something really innovative to get the word of the rocket out there. We'd love to have you on board the Tweet Rocket.


Limited edition Tweet Rocket tee (as seen in the campaign video)


Risks and challenges

With every campaign being built manually, a challenge we'll face is turnaround time for campaign setups. When the new version of Tweet Rocket is open to the public, we estimate an influx of sign ups (hopefully). A good problem to have, but we're determined to keep setup time short to get you up and running as soon as possible. 

Funding will not only allow us to expand the team to cope with the load, but the new system will cut down setup time by 50% using our advanced feed finder, which takes up the majority of the time when setting up campaigns at present.


Please help spread the word about Tweet Rocket to your friends, family, enemies and co-workers via Twitter, Facebook, email, or any other means. You can find the share links at the top of this page. With your help we can reach our goal!


This FAQ is being continually updated as more questions are frequently asked

How come the new version is cheaper than the prototype version?

Right now, Tweet Rocket requires a lot of maintenance and updating campaigns is a very manual process. Customers email us the tweaks they want on their campaign and we go in and make the changes. With the dashboard, customers will be able to make their own changes, meaning less time spent on campaigns by us, so we can afford to lower the price.

I'm an existing Tweet Rocket customer. What does this mean for me?

If you've already been enjoying Tweet Rocket, you can continue doing so and your existing subscription won't be affected. When you contribute to this campaign, your subscription price will lower to the new pricing, meaning you save more money and receive a better product.

Can I still signup to the alpha version of Tweet Rocket?

Yes. You can still sign up at https://tweetrocket.co. You'll still receive the high quality campaign setup and prompt customer service should you require changes to your campaign. Still a great option if you want to get started immediately.

Does Tweet Rocket support other languages?

Not at the moment, no. If we secure funding, we'll be exploring multiple language support for Tweet Rocket so that it can truly go global.

Are there discounts available for resellers?

We're still finalising pricing plans for resellers. But it's likely that you will be able to sign up a standard single user account and then you'll be able to purchase additional accounts in packs of 5, 10, 20+ etc at a discounted rate. Keep checking the campaign page for new perks related to reseller accounts.

What are the business benefits?

There're tonnes of resources out there that explain why Twitter is an effective marketing tool for businesses. But we'll summarise by saying that Tweet Rocket allows you to grow an uncapped, laser-targeted audience for your business, all of whom could be potential customers. This is at a fraction of the cost of other marketing channels and in a shorter space of time. 

What’s the best way to use Tweet Rocket?

The best way to use Tweet Rocket is to let it do its thing, whilst tweeting yourself every now and then. Because you know your business better than anyone (even Tweet Rocket!) and it adds more personality to the campaign. Whilst your account is growing, we encourage you to utilise your new found audience and build relationships with people by starting conversations with them.

How much of Tweet Rocket is automated and how much work is done by the team?

We strictly adhere to Twitter's guidelines to ensure that everything is above board and no accounts are suspended. Following and unfollowing are always carried out manually as automating these tasks is prohibited. The rest is all taken care of for you by Tweet Rocket.

How quickly will I see results?

This varies on your industry. Some sectors have a large presence on Twitter, others not as much. However, we've never run a campaign that hasn't shown significant growth within the first 3 months. 

Does Tweet Rocket support other social networks?

This is our long term vision for Tweet Rocket. At the moment, we think other tools do a pretty poor job of incorporating all social network management in a clean and simple way. So we want to nail down Twitter, take on board your feedback and make it awesome and then we'll move onto support for Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram etc.

Your website sucks...

Hey, that's not a question! But we'll address it anyway. Our current website was quickly thrown up as part of the proof of concept. It really is temporary until we get the time or funding to allow us to show off Tweet Rocket in all its glory. It's certainly in the works though.

I have questions, how can I reach your team?

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at indiegogo@tweetrocket.co. Otherwise, you can always reach us at support@tweetrocket.co

story:
Résumé

À travers notre organisme à but non lucratif Académie Réussite, nous organisons en juillet 2015 à Montréal, au Cégep du Vieux-Montréal, un camp élite estival de basketball destiné aux jeunes joueurs prometteurs. Ce camp d’entraînement permettra aux jeunes de perfectionner leur niveau de jeu à l’aide de techniques d’entraînement modernes et ainsi d’aspirer à une carrière universitaire sportive et de participer à des programmes d’entrepreneuriat enrichissants. Nous vous offrons la possibilité de parrainer un jeune joueur afin qu'il puisse financer sa participation au camp.  Nous voulons leur offrir une expérience inoubliable, tant au niveau sportif que personnel, et ainsi promouvoir la persévérance scolaire par la pratique du sport élite. 


L'Académie de Basketball BSA

L’Académie Réussite est un organisme à but non lucratif (OBNL) qui a été fondé par des passionnés de sport, des sciences et de l’entrepreneuriat, dont Frédéric Roy-Gobeil, son président, qui est un ancien joueur élite, entraîneur et entrepreneur. Sa mission est de promouvoir la réussite des jeunes en s’appuyant essentiellement sur la persévérance scolaire, la promotion des saines habitudes de vie, l’accomplissement personnel et le développement du leadership en entrepreneuriat.

Le premier projet de l’organisme comprendra la création d’une académie de basketball (BSA) qui aura comme objectif de promouvoir la persévérance scolaire par la pratique du sport élite.  Le sport est un motivateur bien connu pour aider les jeunes à se dépasser et à viser l’excellence.  Leur succès dans le sport permet aussi de briser le cycle de l’échec par la valorisation de l’école en tant que défi, tout en assurant l’adoption de saines habitudes de vie au quotidien.  Pourquoi le basketball? C’est un sport extrêmement populaire dans les quartiers plus défavorisés où le décrochage scolaire est très présent. Nous offrirons donc à cette clientèle un projet-pilote d’initiation à l’entrepreneuriat qui permettra aux jeunes de financer leur participation aux différentes activités de l’Académie BSA, et de développer leur leadership et leur esprit organisationnel. Nous sommes également en processus de création du site web bsabasketball.ca, sur lequel les jeunes pourront interagir et profiter de services-conseil sportifs et alimentaires.


Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez


La première activité de l’Académie BSA se tiendra du 6 au 10 juillet 2015 sous la forme d’un camp estival élite de basketball au Cégep du Vieux-Montréal.  La mise sur pied de ce camp requiert des achats d’équipements sportifs de pointe, le recrutement d'entraîneurs de renom et la mise en ligne d’une plate-forme web d’entraînement et de nouvelles (académie en ligne) afin d’assurer le suivi des athlètes avec nos entraîneurs-mentors.  Nous désirons également remettre des bourses pour les jeunes méritants (bourses pour le camp ou bourses d’études) et commanditer certains joueurs, afin qu’ils puissent participer au meilleur camp aux États-Unis (HoopGroup.com) et s’assurer une visibilité dans l’optique d’un recrutement universitaire.

Nous avons besoin d'un financement initial de 5000$ pour l'équipement et la location du gymnase et 4000$ pour les salaires des entraîneurs et intervenants.

Nous organiserons différentes activités de financement, dont cette campagne IndieGogo qui représente votre plus simple façon de nous aider! Votre contribution servira à couvrir une partie ou la totalité des frais d'inscription d'un jeune au camp. 

Évidemment, votre principal bénéfice sera d’avoir contribué à enrichir l’été d’un jeune joueur en l’aidant à participer au camp de ses rêves!


D'autres façons d'aider

Si vous ne pouvez pas nous aider avec un don, vous pouvez toujours faire une différence en partageant notre page avec les gens de votre entourage et en passant le mot autour de vous!


Merci de votre confiance. Toute l’équipe de l’Académie ainsi que nos jeunes vous remercient d’avance.

story:
Our Story

The Save BadgerCare Coalition consists of health care providers, public policy experts, disability rights advocates, consumers and the faith community working together to sustain BadgerCare and ensure health insurance for Wisconsin families.

The Impact

Since November or 2010, we have been working to Save BadgerCare by protecting the eligibility, benefits and affordability for the program.  Over 2,000 individuals have joined in our efforts to speak out for the importance of BadgerCare and Medicaid programs to the working families of our state. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have a long fight ahead of us to protect and secure the intergrity of the BadgerCare program and we need your help.  Our goal is to raise $5,000 over the summer to help support the important work of our coalition.  From fact sheets, our postcard campaign, our website, and calls to action, anything donation you can make to help make our important work possible is greatly appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit us and join us on Facebook and get involved in our efforts to Save BadgerCare!

story:
Our Story/Notre Histoire

14 Students from Dawson College in Montreal, Quebec are heading to Palumpur India in June 2011. The Dawson Student Union has partnered with Volunteer Solutions India in order to provide volunteering opportunities to Dawson Students. As a way to involve the larger community, Dawson Students have committed to fundraising an additional $5,000 a year to donate to Volunteering Solutions.


***


14 étudiants du Collège Dawson à Montréal (Québec) se dirigent vers Palumpur, Inde pour y séjourner auprès des villageois au mois de Juin 2011. L’association des étudiantes & étudiants du Collège Dawson (DSU) a établi un partenariat avec "Volunteer Solutions" en Inde afin de fournir des possibilités de bénévolat aux étudiants du Collège Dawson et ainsi leur offir l’opportunité d’accomplir une nouvelle expérience hors du commun. Afin d’impliquer le public, les étudiants du Collège Dawson se sont engagés à la collceted de . fonds supplémentaires de 5000 $ par année et ainsi contribuer directement à la communauté par l’entremise de Volunteer Solutions.

The Impact/L'Impact

Volunteering Solutions runs the 15+ daycares in Palumpur, India. A total of 0 of these daycares have washroom facilities available to the toddlers. The funds raised by the Dawson Student Union would go directly to installing toilets in daycares to the benefit of children in the community.


***

Volunteer Solutions gère plus de 15 garderies à Palumpur, Inde. Un total de 0 de ces garderies possède des installations sanitaires adéquates disponibles aux enfants. Les fonds recueillis par le DSU iront directement à l'installation de toilettes dans les garderies, au profit des enfants de la communauté.


What We Need & What You Get/Détails et logistiques

Every penny raised goes towards providing better sanitary conditions to children in needs. All contributions help -- for additional bonuses, see the perks in the sidebar.


***

Chaque sous reçu fournira de meilleures conditions sanitaires pour les enfants. Pour toutes contributions supplémentaires, s’il vous plait vous dirigez vers la barre latérale à votre droite.


Other Ways You Can Help/Autres façons que vous pouvez aider

We can only make this happen if we 'Do It With Others'. Even if you cannot contribute a financial donation, please consider sharing this on facebook, twitter, tumblr, or by emailing the link to your contacts!


***

Nous pouvons seulement y arriver si nous "fesont avec d'autres" (do it with others). Même si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer un don monétaire, s'il vous plaît aider nous a faire parvenir notre message sur Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, ou en envoyant un courriel à vos contacts!
story_txt:
Our Story/Notre Histoire

14 Students from Dawson College in Montreal, Quebec are heading to Palumpur India in June 2011. The Dawson Student Union has partnered with Volunteer Solutions India in order to provide volunteering opportunities to Dawson Students. As a way to involve the larger community, Dawson Students have committed to fundraising an additional $5,000 a year to donate to Volunteering Solutions.
***

14
étudiants du Collège Dawson à Montréal (Québec) se dirigent vers Palumpur, Inde
pour y séjourner auprès des villageois au mois de Juin 2011. L’association des
étudiantes & étudiants du Collège Dawson (DSU) a établi un partenariat avec
"Volunteer Solutions" en Inde afin de fournir des possibilités de bénévolat aux étudiants du Collège
Dawson et ainsi leur offir l’opportunité d’accomplir une nouvelle expérience
hors du commun. Afin d’impliquer le public, les étudiants du Collège Dawson se
sont engagés à la collceted de . fonds supplémentaires de 5000 $ par année et
ainsi contribuer directement à la communauté par l’entremise de Volunteer
Solutions.

The Impact/L'Impact
Volunteering Solutions runs the 15+ daycares in Palumpur, India. A total of 0 of these daycares have washroom facilities available to the toddlers. The funds raised by the Dawson Student Union would go directly to installing toilets in daycares to the benefit of children in the community.

story:
Hey there!

Thank you for visiting our Organic Comfort campaign and for helping us make a difference for millions of dental patients! Make sure you check the great variety of perks in this campaign.


The cause

Millions of current and would-be dental patients suffer from fear or anxiety about visiting the dentist. Up until now they have relied on chemical approaches to relax such as paying for Nitrous Oxide while being treated, or taking medications like Valium to be able to relax enough to visit the dentist.

But wait. There's a better way! And one that the most progressive and caring dentists are already using. The Language of Ethical Influence. What we teach.

Here's what Encinitas, CA dentist Dr. Isabel David and an ex-anxious patient have to say about what we're doing: 

With this campaign we will be able to scale up our reach from the few hundred local doctors we're in touch with, to the almost 30,000 dental professionals who will be at events like the American Dental Association's (ADA) annual meeting.

If we can exhibit at that conference and we only "touch" 5% of attendees, that could mean we're helping over 3,000,000 dental patients because the average dental office in the US sees 2000-3000 patient visits per year. 

Attending dental conferences to raise awareness, and train dental professionals on the Language of Ethical Influence is expensive. Very expensive! - Exhibiting at the ADA's annual meeting in San Antonio, TX in October will cost us about $7,000 just in travel and registration/booth fees... NOT INCLUDING marketing materials like signage and copies of my book to give away or sell, which will put this conference at over $10,000 for us. But did I mention there will be around 30,000 dental professionals and students at this event?

Please help however you can. There are lots of great goodies in the perks for all sorts of different and diverse interests.

Thank you!


Some more info...

Juan's book "Hypnodontics - Ethical Influence: Language For Dental Professionals" made it to #1 in the Hypnotherapy category on Amazon Kindle's best sellers' list, and it's designed as a textbook for our trainings and for dental schools everywhere. 

Having the amazing opportunity of managing a dental clinic I was able to blend my skills as a hypnotherapist into many aspects of the dental practice and now my team is building the next dental specialty, Hypnodontics.

Now we (2 of us) are basically doing the work that would be better handled by a team of 6-8 people, as we are being invited to speak everywhere in the country and abroad yet we're in the business development phase and lack the resources to hire those people.

Funding the entire goal of 100k will allow us to scale much more smoothly. We would attend ten conferences in the next 15 months and get in front of over 200,000 dental professionals. The same math above shows only touching 5% of that broader audience means we could improve the lives of 20 to 30 MILLION people! 


How you can contribute?

Supporting this campaign is as easy as finding something you like in our perks and "buying it" from us, discounted from what you'd buy direct at the original retail prices. 

We believe you might support this campaign either because anxiety and fear of dentistry has been an issue for you personally or affected somebody you care about. Or simply because you want to be part of the next generation of comfort in dentistry and help us build something BIG!


    Other ways you can help

    Share this campaign on social media, blogs, podcasts, or getting us booked for interviews on any of those or more traditional media. 

    We could use some volunteers as virtual assistants (VAs).

    One or more San Diego area people could volunteer to do clerical work.

    Again... thank you for what you're contributing to patient comfort with this campaign.

    Much love! :-)

    Juan & Dave

story:
Bref résumé

Un but : Mettre mes compétences aux services des associations d'enfants malades à travers une agence de Com qui leur sera dédiée

Un Défi : Courir 500kms de Paris à Londres en 10 jours à raison d'1 ultra marathon de 50kms par jour

Le Paris - Londres running challenge est né tout d'abord d'une envie de changer une vie : la mienne.  Consultante en Communication  j'ai voulu prendre un nouveau départ . Un renouveau professionnel, personnel, physique et mental..........partir sur la route, courir et me retrouver.

En préparant ce challenge j'ai fait des rencontres dont celles qui allaient changer ma vie et me mettre sur la bonne voie

En rencontrant des associations d'enfants malades j'ai pu voir les besoins qu'elles avaient. C'est là que j'ai décidé que ma nouvelle vie devait faire partie de la leur et inversement.

Le challenge Paris - Londres venait de trouver son objectif:

récolter assez de fonds pour ouvrir un bureau de Com dédié aux associations d'enfants malades et de recherches médicales. Ce bureau sera à disposition des associations et de leur communication de façon bénévole. Ils leur permettra de communiquer au grand public, créer des événements , d échanger avec d'autres structures  sur un plan Européen

1 enfant sur 440 développe  un cancer avant l'age de ses 15 ans....ces associations luttent chaque jour pour faire avancer la recherche au niveau Européen. 

Leur offrir une agence de Com disponible à temps complet leur permettra de communiquer leurs actions au public et leurs besoins aux entreprises et aux politiques

Si je peux, grâce à cette agence, les aider à  bâtir un monde meilleur, un monde d'espoirs pour ces enfants, pour nos enfants ....alors ma nouvelle vie aura pris tout son sens


BESOINS :
Montant : 10.000 £
  • Cet argent servira à ouvrir l'agence de Com et aider à son fonctionnement les  premiers mois , le temps d'amener des entreprises à participer et payer la Communication des associations par des évènements communs

L'impact

  • Les fonds récoltés permettront de payer les frais matériels :
  • Ouverture de l'agence, loyers, fournitures de base
  • Les dons permettront d'offrir ce service précieux aux associations dès la fin de la course. De grandes rencontres Européennes ont lieu cette année et en 2017 sur la recherche des maladies orphelines et cancers pédiatriques, ces associations ont besoin de preparer leur Communication afin d'avoir le soutien du grand public 

Risques et défis

Une fois l'agence ouverte le plus grand défi sera de trouver des entreprises prêtes à partager des évènements avec ces associations afin de permettre à l'agence de continuer à fonctionner sur la base du bénévolat

Mais mon expérience et mes compétences en communication évènementielle feront la différence !

***********************************************************************


Summary



A goal  : put my skills at the service of young children diagnosed with Cancer and

rare illnesses through a communication office which will be dedicated to them.

A Challenge : run 500 kms from Paris to London in 10 days, at a rate of 1 Ultra Marathon of 50kms per day.

The Paris – London running challenge was first born from a desire to change a life : my own. I was a communication consultant and I decided to make a fresh start on a professional, personal , physical and spiritual level...hit the road, run and find myself.

Whilst preparing for this challenge, I have been fortunate to meet with people who were going to change my life and help me through this journey.

After meeting with organisations dedicated to ill children, I have realised what they

needed and how difficult it was for them to fight against rare illnesses . That’s when I came to the realisation that my new life had to be a part of theirs and vice versa.

The Paris – London Challenge had just found its goal :

Raise enough funds to open an office dedicated to organisations that look after ill

children and which are involved with the medical research.

That office will be made at the disposal of these organisations on a voluntary basis,

It will enable them to communicate with a broader audience, organise events and establish a network with different structures on the European arena.

1 child out of 440 develops a cancer before the age of 15...these organisations fight

every day to push the research forward.

To offer them a communication office on a full time basis will help bring an awareness of their actions and initiatives towards other companies and communicate their need to political entities; a larger awareness to a larger audience.

If I can, with this office, help them build a better world, where there is hope for these children,...... our children...then my new life would have found its purpose.

WHAT I NEED :

£ 10.000

. This money will help to set up the office and will provide a smooth run of operations during the first months of its activity. It will also give us time to get in touch with companies and get them on board to participate and fund the communication of the organisations through common events.

THE IMPACT

.The funds will allow us to pay for charges and expenses :

.office, rent, furniture…

The funds will enable the office to start working for the organisations straight after the run. Big European meetings are taking place this year and the following one, on

research for rare diseases and paediatric cancers : these organisations need help to

prepare their communication and get a broad audience’s attention and help.

Challenges :

Once the office is open, the biggest challenge will be to find companies that are ready to host events for these organisations and allow the office to keep working on a voluntary basis.

But my experience and skills in communication will make a difference !

story:
Appendix Cancer is rare.  One in 500,000 get this type of cancer.  My treatment began in May with Chemotherapy and I have completed 8 rounds of treatment.  God has provided me with a hedge of protection that has encompassed my life please join in prayer and support as I fight this battle.  

You can follow me on my blog at www.kickincancerass.blogspot.com

story:
Hello,

My name is Matthew Emerton, and I am a personal trainer who recently moved to San Francisco from Nebraska. My mother (Front, right in picture) recently became a personal trainer/group fitness instructor as well, in our hometown in central Nebraska. When she began teaching fitness classes, she also wanted to do something to help others in the local community, thus the creation of her group "Between a Walk and a Hard Place." My mother donates half of the money of all of her fitness classes to this cause, and then, between Thanksgiving and Christmas, donates 100% of the money to help families in the community battling cancer. Cancer can be a heavy economic burden for patients and their families in the surrounding communities, as the closest cancer treatment hospital is a 4-hour drive away. Hospital bills, lost wages, and other expenses can add up quickly, even for patients with good insurance coverage. "Between a Walk and a Hard Pace" uses the money to provide fuel cards, hotel rooms, and restaurant gift cards which the families can use during their trips to Omaha for treatment. 
This year, my mother is hosting a Fitness Marathon Event on Dec. 27, and all proceeds will go to this fund. I wanted to start this campaign to hopefully raise a little more money, and present it to my mother during this event. All donations to this campaign will go directly to the "Between a Walk and a Hard Pace" fund, and be directly used to help families dealing with cancer in the community. 
My mother is an amazing lady with a great heart, and she has donated so much of her time for this cause, and I wanted to honor that, and help her give back. She followed my footsteps getting into the fitness industry, and now I would like to follow hers in giving back to the community where I grew up. 
I am starting this campaign in San Francisco because I would like to keep it a surprise for my mother, but feel free to join Between a Walk and Hard Pace's facebook group, where she posts daily health/fitness related articles, tips and motivation. But remember, mums the word until after Christmas :) 
My goal for the amount of donations is set at $500, but anything will be truly appreciated, so no matter what is received, it will all be put to good use. 
In return, anyone in the San Francisco area who donates $20 or more will receive a complimentary Personal Training session from myself, and your name will be mentioned when I present the gift to my mother. Donations of $100 or more will earn 3 complimentary personal training sessions.
