story:
We believe that all women should have access to free mammograms and breast cancer prevention programs regardless of their location, access to transport, or ability to pay.

A Vision of Health is a 501(C)(3) non-profit organization dedicated to providing free breast cancer prevention and early detection services to underserved communities where resources are limited. Every year over 200,000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer and it is estimated that 1 out of every 8 women will develop the disease in their lifetime.  

When breast cancer is detected early, the chances of survival greatly increase. Since breast cancer screenings began 30 years ago, we have decreased the mortality rate by 30%.  Sadly, however, many of these women do not have the insurance or money to pay for screenings to catch the growth early, increasing the risk of the disease spreading and it becoming a life-threatening problem.


Our Mission is to go directly into underserved communities and provide free mobile mammograms and breast cancer prevention programs to women that otherwise would not be available to them.

It is estimated that 68% of women without insurance are not getting their annual breast cancer screenings.  Even of those with insurance, over 50% of women in underserved communities are not getting their mammograms.  This is largely due to limited resources, access to transportation and money.  We aim to fix that!


With your support, we can reach our goal of 100,000 screenings by 2020 by raising enough money to provide mobile mammography services directly from our coach, allowing us to reach 20x more people in communities previously unreachable.

We now have a coach that will provide us direct access to thousands of women in underserved communities that need of our free services.  We are looking to raise up to $1 million dollars to operate our nationwide outreach campaign and purchase the newest, state of the art tomosynthesis mammography machine. This machine will allow us to offer the highest quality breast cancer screening to any woman, anywhere at anytime.

The impact of your donation is important and NEEDED!

With our tomosynthesis technology and coach we will be able to achieve the following:

  • Reach up to 20x more women who need more mammograms
  • Provide true on-the-go mammography that will allow us to offer free on-site mammograms
  • Reach women in their communities, in a comfortable and convenient setting, where access to a clinic or hospital is difficult
  • Provide on-site services with unlimited flexibility
  • SAVE THOUSANDS OF LIVES EACH YEAR!

Every dollar counts towards saving lives, and we want to show you our appreciation for your contribution!

In addition to the tax benefits of donating funds to our certified 501(c)(3) non-profit, we would like to award various fun prizes for your generous contributions:

  • $25 = Certificate of Appreciation. Receive a Certificate of Appreciation in the mail signed by the Founder of A Vision of Health, Debora Wright, for your generous contribution to our cause!
  • $50 = Breast Cancer Pin. Receive a commemorative breast cancer ribbon pin from A Vision of Health for your generous contribution.
  • $100 = A Vision of Health T-Shirt.  Receive a t-shirt with the breast cancer ribbon on it from A Vision of Health for your generous contribution.
  • $250 = T-Shirt & Signed Book Combo. Receive an A Vision of Health T-Shirt and a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller.
  • $500 = Signed Book + Free Mammogram. Receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a FREE mammogram from A Vision of Health.
  • $1,000 = Book, Mammogram & Site Listing. Receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a FREE mammogram from A Vision of Health and have your name or Company's logo listed on the A Vision of Health website for 1 year!
  • $2,500 = Coach Recognition.  Have your name or Company's name permanently listed as a Sponsor on the A Vision of Health coach plus receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a FREE mammogram.
  • $5,000 = Featured Coach Recognition +.  Have your name or Company's logo permanently listed as a Featured Sponsor on the A Vision of Health's Coach plus receive an private invitation to an exclusive Appreciation Dinner Banquet.  Also receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a (3) FREE mammograms to use or give away
  • $10,000 = Coach Recognition + Banquet.  Have your name or Company's logo permanently listed as a Platinum Sponsor on the A Vision of Health's Coach plus receive a private invitation to an exclusive Appreciation Dinner Banquet where you will be honored as a Featured Sponsor.  Also receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a (5) FREE mammograms to use or give away.
  • $25,000 = Dinner with Debbie Wright.  Sit down and have dinner with the founder of A Vision of Health, Debbie Wright. Also, have your name or Company's logo permanently listed as a Platinum Sponsor on the A Vision of Health's Coach plus receive an private invitation to an exclusive Appreciation Dinner Banquet where you will be honored as a Featured Sponsor.
  • $50,000 = Mammography Party + More. For your generous contribution, the A Vision of Health coach will travel to a location of your choice (within the United States) and host a full day FREE mammography screening party for you and up to 100 of your guests. ($75,000 value)  Great for a corporate event or a large organization!  Also be recognized with your name or logo on the AVOH coach as a Platinum Sponsor and at the Appreciation Dinner Banquet to be held in Los Angeles.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute monetary support, there are other ways :

  • Use the social networking share tools and spread the word to family & friends
  • Volunteer your services at any of our community events by contacting tasha@avisionofhealth.org
  • We also accept donations of all types to be raffled off at our fundraisers, so if you are interested in donating any of your own products or services contact tasha@avisionofhealth.org
  • Visit us online at www.avisionofhealth.org for more information!

Thank you everyone for your consideration and for helping to make our VISION a REALITY!
story_txt:
We believe that all women should have access to free mammograms and breast cancer prevention programs regardless of their location, access to transport, or ability to pay.

A Vision of Health is a 501(C)(3) non-profit organization dedicated to providing free breast cancer prevention and early detection services to underserved communities where resources are limited. Every year over 200,000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer and it is estimated that 1 out of every 8 women will develop the disease in their lifetime.  
When breast cancer is detected early, the chances of survival greatly increase. Since breast cancer screenings began 30 years ago, we have decreased the mortality rate by 30%.  Sadly, however, many of these women do not have the insurance or money to pay for screenings to catch the growth early, increasing the risk of the disease spreading and it becoming a life-threatening problem.


Our Mission is to go directly into underserved communities and provide free mobile mammograms and breast cancer prevention programs to women that otherwise would not be available to them.
It is estimated that 68% of women without insurance are not getting their annual breast cancer screenings.  Even of those with insurance, over 50% of women in underserved communities are not getting their mammograms.  This is largely due to limited resources, access to transportation and money.  We aim to fix that!

With your support, we can reach our goal of 100,000 screenings by 2020 by raising enough money to provide mobile mammography services directly from our coach, allowing us to reach 20x more people in communities previously unreachable.

We now have a coach that will provide us direct access to thousands of women in underserved communities that need of our free services.  We are looking to raise up to $1 million dollars to operate our nationwide outreach campaign and purchase the newest, state of the art tomosynthesis mammography machine. This machine will allow us to offer the highest quality breast cancer screening to any woman, anywhere at anytime.


The impact of your donation is important and NEEDED!
 With our tomosynthesis technology and coach we will be able to achieve the following: 
Reach up to 20x more women who need more mammograms
Provide true on-the-go mammography that will allow us to offer free on-site mammograms
Reach women in their communities, in a comfortable and convenient setting, where access to a clinic or hospital is difficult Provide on-site services with unlimited flexibility

SAVE THOUSANDS OF LIVES EACH YEAR!


  



Every dollar counts towards saving lives, and we want to show you our appreciation for your contribution!
In addition to the tax benefits of donating funds to our certified 501(c)(3) non-profit, we would like to award various fun prizes for your generous contributions:


$25 = Certificate of Appreciation. Receive a Certificate of Appreciation in the mail signed by the Founder of A Vision of Health, Debora Wright, for your generous contribution to our cause!

$50 = Breast Cancer Pin. Receive a commemorative breast cancer ribbon pin from A Vision of Health for your generous contribution.

$100 = A Vision of Health T-Shirt.  Receive a t-shirt with the breast cancer ribbon on it from A Vision of Health for your generous contribution.

$250 = T-Shirt & Signed Book Combo. Receive an A Vision of Health T-Shirt and a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller.

$500 = Signed Book + Free Mammogram. Receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a FREE mammogram from A Vision of Health.

$1,000 = Book, Mammogram & Site Listing. Receive a personalized signed copy of "Eat to Lose, Eat to Win" health and nutrition book by The Biggest Loser's Rachel Beller plus a Certificate for a FREE mammogram from A Vision of Health and have your name or Company's logo listed on the A Vision of Health website for 1 year!

$25,000 = Dinner with Debbie Wright.  Sit down and have dinner with the founder of A Vision of Health, Debbie Wright. Also, have your name or Company's logo permanently listed as a Platinum Sponsor on the A Vision of Health's Coach plus receive an private invitation to an exclusive Appreciation Dinner Banquet where you will be honored as a Featured Sponsor.

$50,000 = Mammography Party + More. For your generous contribution, the A Vision of Health coach will travel to a location of your choice (within the United States) and host a full day FREE mammography screening party for you and up to 100 of your guests. ($75,000 value)  Great for a corporate event or a large organization!  Also be recognized with your name or logo on the AVOH coach as a Platinum Sponsor and at the Appreciation Dinner Banquet to be held in Los Angeles.


Other Ways You Can Help
 If you can't contribute monetary support, there are other ways : 
Use the social networking share tools and spread the word to family & friends
Volunteer your services at any of our community events by contacting tasha@avisionofhealth.org
We also accept donations of all types to be raffled off at our fundraisers, so if you are interested in donating any of your own products or services contact tasha@avisionofhealth.org

story:
88 in 88

We're heading to all 88 counties in Ohio in 88 days to share music, love, and the story behind TMMP:

  • This will be the beginning of a nationwide movement- providing cost-free, anonymous emotional support and/or care to any United States Armed Service Member. Any discharge type and any service year are included. These services are also offered to immediate family members. 
  • We're in the process of lining up providers from a variety of health and emotional care providers. Think East meets West. Massage? Yes. Couples' therapy? Yes. Acupuncture? Absolutely! 
  • We have BIG plans around here, but we need your help! We invite you to join us in an endeavor that will surely benefit someone you know and/or love.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need approximately $10,000 to get rolling. This will cover an initial marketing design and campaign, and will fund the basic costs of the 88 in 88 promotional tour. 
  • Receive big thanks in a variety of places, a support letter mailed to the recipient of your choice, a video documenting our trip, or sponsor the county of your choice!
  • If we do not reach our entire goal, we will still move forward with the plan on an adjusted schedule while we secure funding in alternative ways. 

    Risks & Challenges

    If the funds are not raised by either this campaign or other means, the launch date for the 88 in 88 may slightly change, but WILL happen! 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Looking for another way to pitch in?

    • Tell a veteran that you know, tell your family, tell your friends, tell your pets, tell everyone!
    • Use Indiegogo Share Tools, Facebook, Twitter, or good 'ol word-of-mouth!

story:
What protection standard do the filters meet?

 

AirZ has a professional 5-layer protective filter that is certified by an independent international laboratory to PFE & ASTM2101 standards.

 

What can AirZ filter?

 

 

What is active air-flow?

 

Unlike all other masks, AirZ's built-in fan can actively bring clean, fresh and cool air to you, and all inhaled air goes through 5 protective filter layers giving perfect breathability and eliminating sweatiness inside your mask.

 

Why do I need three air-flow speed?

 

Protecting your health is a full-time, all-day priority, which means your mask should be suitable for all of your daily activities so we designed it with that in mind, providing customizable air-flow to suit your needs.

AirZ Filtration Smart Device's tri-modal adjustment can protect you when working or exercising, from indoors to outdoors.

 

How does it work and is it comfortable to wear?

 

AirZ has a built-in Wind Wheel Module to provide enough airflow based on your different demands, and the Filter Module deals with all micropollutant particles, so you can always enjoy fresh air. The Ergonomic Silicone Pad enables you to wear it for a long time without any discomfort.

 

Is it troublesome to change the filter?

 

Not at all - just take off the front panel and put the filter in then close it up, that's it!!!

 

It looks cool, but what's the weight and does it get noisy at the highest speed?

 

AirZ only weighs 97g, including a silicone pad and ergonomic design, so it's very easy to wear it for a long time. The noise at the highest 3rd gear speed is less than 30dB (you can hear the sound of a pencil drawing lines in a 30dB environment)

 

How many hours can the Smart Filtration Device last?

 

AirZ supports quick charge, where a 2-hour charge can provide around 5 hours of continuous use.

 

Test Report

 

How it works

story:
A funny thing happened during our 5 year battle with cancer, we learned about healthy living.

Jan and Joe want to share how to live healthier but we need your help to do it. We promise to deliver the MOST important thing we learned. Read on to find out what it is.

OUR MISSION

We are dedicated to help everyone to understand that "Few things have as powerful an effect on your health and the health of your family as the FOOD YOU EAT and the ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY of your home.” You CAN and MUST control these factors with our help. We will provide science-based education and nutritional information and quality proven affordable products and services for you and your home which will provide the building blocks of good health.

Introducing LIVE HEALTHY INTL a purpose-driven company offering unique products for healthy living and healthy homes 

OUR STORY

Why do we care? We're driven by our founders desire to empower people to live full and healthy lives. While enduring more than 400 hours of chemotherapy in just 40 months, Joe and his caregiver wife of 47 years Jan took a deep dive into cancer care and immune system rebuilding literature. They were determined to find ways to stay strong, recover and strengthen Joe's immune system. After three bouts with his cancer in four years they did, and they learned a few things along the way. Now they are devoted to helping others get and stay healthy, whether they're fighting an  illness, or just trying to improve their quality of life.

We are launching Live Healthy Intl to help make good health achieveable for everyone.  We will give 10 percent of all our profits to needy health and wellness organizations.  We are also developing our “Supplement Assistance Program” that will make our products widely available. In addition, our website will become a primary resource for timely information on nutrition, wellness, disease prevention, and the science of good health.

Essential Nutrition
Our first product offering, Live Healthy Intl Parent Essential Oil PEOs, provide a missing piece in American nutrition: An organic, plant-based source of Omega-6 and Omega-3 essential fatty acids (EFAs), arguably one of the most important pair of nutrients in the human diet.

PEOs truly are essential nutrients. Decades of research has shown that scientifically balanced Omega-6 and 3 have a decisive importance in nutrition, supporting wellness throughout the life-cycle, from the development of the brain in infancy to life-long cardiovascular health.

PEOs are the body’s oxygen magnets, making every cell membrane a splendid conductor of oxygen. They draw it from our bloodstream into our cellular engines where it powers all the functions that keep us healthy and fit for life, FORTIFYING OPTIMAL HEALTH.

Typically omega 3 has been obtained from fish oil.


FISH OIL – THE PROBLEM


HERE IS WHAT DOCTORS ARE SAYING
1. Dr. David Agus, Westside Cancer Center, University of Southern California is featured in this CBS This Morning video, April 2015 "Something Fishy? New questions about safety of popular fish oil supplement".

2. "There is no medical evidence to say fish oils that are sold over the counter actually do what the claim". Is how The Bulletin, a publication that serves the people of Oregon, summarized in a March 27, 2014 article. The conclusions of a report by Oregon State University that was commissioned by The Oregon Health Authority and reviewed by the Oregon Pharmacy and Therapeutics Committee made up of a group of Pharmacists and Doctors.

3. The University of California Berkeley Wellness Report titled "Omega 3 supplements in Question" dated March 9, 2014 states:

“DISAPOINTING FINDINGS from Clinical Trials and analysis during the past 2 years have called into question the proposed Cardiovascular benefits of FISH OIL Supplements." 

4. The New York Times dated March 30,2015 
“FISH OIL CLAIMS NOT SUPPORTED by RESEARCH”
The vast majority of clinical trials involving fish oil have found NO EVIDENCE that it lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke. Dr Andrew Grey an associate professor of medicine at the University of Auckland in New Zealand and the author of a 2014 study on fish oil in JAMA INTERNAL MEDICINE says, “ There is a major disconnect, THE SALES ARE GOING UP DESPITE THE PROGRESSIVE ACCUMULATION OF TRIALS THAT SHOW NO EFFECT.”

In the same NY Times article Dr Gianni Tognoni of the institute for Pharmacological Research in Milan states, “I THINK THE ERA OF FISH OIL AS MEDICATION COULD BE CONSIDERED OVER NOW.”

These are just a few of the growing number of experts we chose to introduce you to the current direction of studies that shows the ineffectiveness of fish oil.

We need to ask ourselves why fish oils are not working. The major problem comes from the way it is processed.

FACTS ABOUT PROCESSING FISH OILS

Fish have no glands so creating fish oil supplements basically means you get “JUICED” fish. Juiced fish is the worst way to get your EFAs – only one reason our PEO EFAs are plant-based containing no fish oils.

Another reason is a lot of fish contain toxins, like mercury from where they live. That is why most fish oil is ADULTERATED meaning a high heat processing of ground up whole fish and treating with chemicals to get the toxins out.  

Fish oil is also a derivative form of EPA and DHA not the PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL form L.A. and A.L.A. that nature intended for us. Fish oil and Krill oil are animal-derived and contain cholesterol while our cold-pressed, plant derived PARENT EFAs contain no cholesterol at all.

WHY WOULD YOU TAKE FISH OIL WHEN THE NEXT GENERATION OF PLANT SEED BASED PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL EFAS ARE NOW AVAILABLE?


PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL – THE SOLUTION

Professor Brian Peskin Founder of Life-Systems Engineering Science is the creator of our patented PEOs. During his extensive research he came upon the work of Dr Otto Warburg MD., PH.D. a German Scientist in the 1930's. Dr. Warburg discovered that the degeneration of oxygen in the cells was a hidden cause of cancer. He was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1931 for his work. This lead to Prof. Peskin discovery that the cause of many other health problems like heart disease and diabetes is due to the lack of oxygen in cells. 

The last eight years PEOs have been marketed almost exclusively through Medical Doctors and now Live Healthy Intl is making them available to everyone. Please take the time to watch Prof. Peskin's 13 minute video which will explain what they are and how they work in your body.



Prof. Peskin talks about Arterial Compliance improvement by using the PEO Formulation. It is fully explained by Prof. Brian S. Peskin with David Sim, MD, Interventional Cardiologist in:

Proof of Concept in Humans
Investigating Oils With respect to Arterial flexibility (photoplethysmography) 

IOWA Study Results
Remarkable experimental results of arterial  compliance improvement with PEO formulation
   
You will find the complete 8 page study with 27 scientific references at www.livehealthyintl.com
   
HERE ARE THE BENEFITS BY TAKING HLI PEOs


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Take a deep breath. Imagine how you would feel if every cell in your body was getting an optimal supply of oxygen. Doctors overwhelmingly believe that oxygen-rich cells are the key to good health, and many recommend PEOs for their therapeutic effect on heart disease, diabetes, auto-immune disorders, cancer and arthritis.

Unfortunately few people even know about PEOs. 

Our market research  confirmed retail stores lacked the information available to consumers and how difficult the dissemination of facts is . Therefore rather than develope the expertise to navigate the supply chain, Live Healthy Intl decided to offer our PEOs and Live Healthy information direct to our customers.

Your contribution will enable us to:

  1. Expand our website, making it more accessible, user-friendly and information rich. 
  2. Add Liquid PEOs for those who can't swallow capsules and for our vegan friends.
  3. Add 2 new products, Herbal and Minerals to complete the PEO Formulation.
  4. Launch our Supplement Assistance Program so everyone can have access to benefits of PEOs.


TIMELINE

 November 2014              Started taking PEOs

 January 2015                    Getting positive results  

  February-April 2015       Acquired product and test marketed                                                                                           

  • June 2015                    Launch campaign
  • June 2015                   Start shipping the rewards
  • July 2015                     Launch the Liquid PEOs
  • July/August 2015    Upgrade website
  • August 2015               Launch 2 new products Herbal and Minerals
  • September 2015       Launch Patented whole house filtration system            
  • January 2016             Launch Patented one of a kind counter top Fruit  and  vegetable sanitizer 


TEAM

Joe LoBiondo an entrepreneur, marathoner and cancer survivor is a new breed of business person driven more by purpose than profit. After his latest round of chemo in April of 2014 he and Jan started discussions on how to help others get and stay healthy. All the sick people they encountered during his 5 year battle in Doctors offices, blood draw and infusion centers, hospitals and support group meetings both cancer and caregiver related inspired them. They wanted to share the benefits of the science-based nutrition they discovered in helping Joe handle the treatments and help rebuild his immune system to hopefully have a longer remission.  They wanted to find and provide affordable products and services that support good individual health and healthy homes. Joe is our President.


Jan LoBiondo is a wife, mother of 5, grandmother of 10, great-grandmother of 2. She has owned and operated a custom made children's clothing store and a custom made drapery business and has also worked in retail for 23 years including managing an Eddie Bauer store for 8 years. She is very active in the community by helping with soup kitchens, homeless shelters, and leads with a friend  a baby quilt making group for at risk mothers with babies. This more than qualifies her to be our CUSTOMER CARE OFFICER a new position for purpose-driven companies. Her goal is to make sure every decision of LHI considers the customer needs, wants and desires.


Jim Hosley has had an extraordinarily influential career in business development, management, helping entrepreneurs and individuals. He has worked with start ups and established companies guiding them to achieve their goals and make positive contributions to the world. He earned his Executive MBA in International Business at INSTEAD in Fontainbleu, France, and has served numerous public interest organizations, most recently The Center for Excellence in Education. At LHI Jim sets the companies course aligning goals and operations with his vision of a world in which business creates a wide spectrum of economic, social and environmental value. Jim is our VP of Operations.


Jon LoBiondo was a health and physical education teacher and now is an assistant Principal in our public schools. He is or has been a husband, father, state champion wrestler, life-long surfer and coach. Jon teaches and embodies the values of LHI which is science-based nutrition which has powered his athletic endeavors. Recently he successfully completed a grueling Spartan endurance race at Ft Collins, Colorado and he is training for another Spartan race twice as long. He has served on the board, which included a short stint as President, of the Delaware Association of Health, Physical Education and Dance (DAPHERD) which will help him to lead LHI efforts to communicate the benefits of sound nutrition. Jon is our VP of community outreach and education.


FREE FINAL REWARD

Everyone who contributes to our campaign will receive free membership into LHI “HEALTH CLUB” – This entitles you to the following benefits:

  1. Valuable Gift Cards
  2. Advance Notices
  3. Special Deals
  4. Product Discounts

This is a $59.95 value.

THE PRODUCTS WE ARE OFFERING WILL NOT BE SOLD IN STORES!


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS?

Q: Isn't fish oil supposed to be good for you since doctors are recommending it? Unfortunately assumptions were made years ago about fish oil benefits but now real science is proving a lot of those benefits are not happening.

Q: I thought fish oil is sustainable?
No, not even Krill oil is sustainable, as all fish are being over harvested.

Q: Are the PEOs sustainable?
Absolutely as they are derived from Organic plant based seeds that are cold processed and natural.

Q: What do you mean by Adulterated fish oil?
It happens when the whole fish is ground up, cooked at high temperatures and treated with chemicals to get rid of the TOXINS. A lot of the healthy properties are lost in the process.

Q: Why wouldn't the health food stores try your product?
Retailers will when there is demand as they have significant shelf space invested in fish oil products that up until now have required little effort other than to make inventory available.

Q: Do you really believe you can gain traction by only selling direct to the consumer?
Yes we do, but it will be a slow process until information is widely distributed to consumers. Journalists and bloggers with large followings can really help us spread the word.


THANK ALL OF YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE TIME.
Jan and Joe  would like to ask for one more favor which is:

If you like what you see, even if you are not in a position to contribute, PLEASE consider sharing this story with your family and friends through email and your social networks. It would be very appreciated as it will help us get the word out about living healthy. The TEAM!

We are here for you. Feel free to contact us lobo8@comcast.net or call 302-827-4977.

The New York Times dated March 30,2015  “FISH OIL CLAIMS NOT SUPPORTED by RESEARCH” The vast majority of clinical trials involving fish oil have found NO EVIDENCE that it lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke. Dr Andrew Grey an associate professor of medicine at the University of Auckland in New Zealand and the author of a 2014 study on fish oil in JAMA INTERNAL MEDICINE says, “ There is a major disconnect, THE SALES ARE GOING UP DESPITE THE PROGRESSIVE ACCUMULATION OF TRIALS THAT SHOW NO EFFECT.”
In the same NY Times article Dr Gianni Tognoni of the institute for Pharmacological Research in Milan states, “I THINK THE ERA OF FISH OIL AS MEDICATION COULD BE CONSIDERED OVER NOW.”
These are just a few of the growing number of experts we chose to introduce you to the current direction of studies that shows the ineffectiveness of fish oil.
We need to ask ourselves why fish oils are not working. The major problem comes from the way it is processed.


FACTS ABOUT PROCESSING FISH OILSFish have no glands so creating fish oil supplements basically means you get “JUICED” fish. Juiced fish is the worst way to get your EFAs – only one reason our PEO EFAs are plant-based containing no fish oils.
Another reason is a lot of fish contain toxins, like mercury from where they live. That is why most fish oil is ADULTERATED meaning a high heat processing of ground up whole fish and treating with chemicals to get the toxins out.  
Fish oil is also a derivative form of EPA and DHA not the PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL form L.A. and A.L.A. that nature intended for us. Fish oil and Krill oil are animal-derived and contain cholesterol while our cold-pressed, plant derived PARENT EFAs contain no cholesterol at all.
WHY WOULD YOU TAKE FISH OIL WHEN THE NEXT GENERATION OF PLANT SEED BASED PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL EFAS ARE NOW AVAILABLE?

PARENT ESSENTIAL OIL – THE SOLUTIONProfessor Brian Peskin Founder of Life-Systems Engineering Science is the creator of our patented PEOs. During his extensive research he came upon the work of Dr Otto Warburg MD., PH.D. a German Scientist in the 1930's. Dr. Warburg discovered that the degeneration of oxygen in the cells was a hidden cause of cancer. He was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1931 for his work. This lead to Prof. Peskin discovery that the cause of many other health problems like heart disease and diabetes is due to the lack of oxygen in cells. 
The last eight years PEOs have been marketed almost exclusively through Medical Doctors and now Live Healthy Intl is making them available to everyone. Please take the time to watch Prof. Peskin's 13 minute video which will explain what they are and how they work in your body.

Prof. Peskin talks about Arterial Compliance improvement by using the PEO Formulation. It is fully explained by Prof. Brian S. Peskin with David Sim, MD, Interventional Cardiologist in:
Proof of Concept in HumansInvestigating Oils With respect to Arterial flexibility (photoplethysmography) 
IOWA Study ResultsRemarkable experimental results of arterial  compliance improvement with PEO formulation   You will find the complete 8 page study with 27 scientific references at www.livehealthyintl.com   HERE ARE THE BENEFITS BY TAKING HLI PEOs




WHY WE NEED YOUR HELPTake a deep breath. Imagine how you would feel if every cell in your body was getting an optimal supply of oxygen. Doctors overwhelmingly believe that oxygen-rich cells are the key to good health, and many recommend PEOs for their therapeutic effect on heart disease, diabetes, auto-immune disorders, cancer and arthritis.Unfortunately few people even know about PEOs. Our market research  confirmed retail stores lacked the information available to consumers and how difficult the dissemination of facts is . Therefore rather than develope the expertise to navigate the supply chain, Live Healthy Intl decided to offer our PEOs and Live Healthy information direct to our customers.Your contribution will enable us to:
Expand our website, making it more accessible, user-friendly and information rich.  
Add Liquid PEOs for those who can't swallow capsules and for our vegan friends.

Add 2 new products, Herbal and Minerals to complete the PEO Formulation.
Launch our Supplement Assistance Program so everyone can have access to benefits of PEOs.
TIMELINE November 2014              Started taking PEOs January 2015                    Getting positive results    February-April 2015       Acquired product and test marketed                                                                                            
June 2015                    Launch campaign
June 2015                   Start shipping the rewards
July 2015                     Launch the Liquid PEOs 
July/August 2015    Upgrade website
August 2015               Launch 2 new products Herbal and Minerals
September 2015       Launch Patented whole house filtration system            
January 2016             Launch Patented one of a kind counter top Fruit  and  vegetable sanitizer 
TEAMJoe LoBiondo an entrepreneur, marathoner and cancer survivor is a new breed of business person driven more by purpose than profit. After his latest round of chemo in April of 2014 he and Jan started discussions on how to help others get and stay healthy. All the sick people they encountered during his 5 year battle in Doctors offices, blood draw and infusion centers, hospitals and support group meetings both cancer and caregiver related inspired them. They wanted to share the benefits of the science-based nutrition they discovered in helping Joe handle the treatments and help rebuild his immune system to hopefully have a longer remission.  They wanted to find and provide affordable products and services that support good individual health and healthy homes. Joe is our President.Jan LoBiondo is a wife, mother of 5, grandmother of 10, great-grandmother of 2. She has owned and operated a custom made children's clothing store and a custom made drapery business and has also worked in retail for 23 years including managing an Eddie Bauer store for 8 years. She is very active in the community by helping with soup kitchens, homeless shelters, and leads with a friend  a baby quilt making group for at risk mothers with babies. This more than qualifies her to be our CUSTOMER CARE OFFICER a new position for purpose-driven companies. Her goal is to make sure every decision of LHI considers the customer needs, wants and desires.Jim Hosley has had an extraordinarily influential career in business development, management, helping entrepreneurs and individuals. He has worked with start ups and established companies guiding them to achieve their goals and make positive contributions to the world. He earned his Executive MBA in International Business at INSTEAD in Fontainbleu, France, and has served numerous public interest organizations, most recently The Center for Excellence in Education. At LHI Jim sets the companies course aligning goals and operations with his vision of a world in which business creates a wide spectrum of economic, social and environmental value. Jim is our VP of Operations.Jon LoBiondo was a health and physical education teacher and now is an assistant Principal in our public schools. He is or has been a husband, father, state champion wrestler, life-long surfer and coach. Jon teaches and embodies the values of LHI which is science-based nutrition which has powered his athletic endeavors. Recently he successfully completed a grueling Spartan endurance race at Ft Collins, Colorado and he is training for another Spartan race twice as long. He has served on the board, which included a short stint as President, of the Delaware Association of Health, Physical Education and Dance (DAPHERD) which will help him to lead LHI efforts to communicate the benefits of sound nutrition. Jon is our VP of community outreach and education.FREE FINAL REWARDEveryone who contributes to our campaign will receive free membership into LHI “HEALTH CLUB” – This entitles you to the following benefits:
Valuable Gift Cards
Advance Notices
Special Deals
Product Discounts
This is a $59.95 value.THE PRODUCTS WE ARE OFFERING WILL NOT BE SOLD IN STORES!FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS?Q: Isn't fish oil supposed to be good for you since doctors are recommending it? Unfortunately assumptions were made years ago about fish oil benefits but now real science is proving a lot of those benefits are not happening.Q: I thought fish oil is sustainable?No, not even Krill oil is sustainable, as all fish are being over harvested.Q: Are the PEOs sustainable?Absolutely as they are derived from Organic plant based seeds that are cold processed and natural.Q: What do you mean by Adulterated fish oil?It happens when the whole fish is ground up, cooked at high temperatures and treated with chemicals to get rid of the TOXINS. A lot of the healthy properties are lost in the process.Q: Why wouldn't the health food stores try your product?Retailers will when there is demand as they have significant shelf space invested in fish oil products that up until now have required little effort other than to make inventory available.Q: Do you really believe you can gain traction by only selling direct to the consumer?Yes we do, but it will be a slow process until information is widely distributed to consumers. Journalists and bloggers with large followings can really help us spread the word.THANK ALL OF YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE TIME.Jan and Joe  would like to ask for one more favor which is:If you like what you see, even if you are not in a position to contribute, PLEASE consider sharing this story with your family and friends through email and your social networks. It would be very appreciated as it will help us get the word out about living healthy. The TEAM!We are here for you. Feel free to contact us lobo8@comcast.net or call 302-827-4977.

story:
Update juli 2015: Stichting Mone, drukkerij in Etten-Leur, heeft het boek uitgebracht. Ondertussen hebben we meer dan 40 exemplaren verkocht en hebben alle contributors hun prachtige exemplaar gekregen.

Extra's in het boek: quote's, edelsteenfoto's, tips en muziek cd.

Boek bestellen: je kan nog je eigen exemplaar van het boek bestellen voor € 12,50. Mail naar team@miskraamverwerken.nl.

Anja over de methode: "Ik ben met de methode aan de slag gegaan. Deze had een enorme impact op me. Ik had zelf niet eens in de gaten hoeveel verdriet er nog in me zat. Sinds die reis heb ik niet één keer meer over Kevin gedroomd. Als ik nu aan hem denk is het met een heel rustig gevoel en vol liefde."


Doe je mee?

Wij willen het boek 'Geen beschuit met muisjes'(werktitel Miskraam Verwerken), geschreven door Joyce Beckker, laten drukken. Het is onze missie en passie om moeders van ongeboren kinderen te helpen hun vroegere ervaringen in een ander licht te zien.

Waarom?

Joyce is ervaringsdeskundige. Doordat zijzelf door haar omgeving bij haar eerste miskraam de zwartepiet kreeg toebedeeld, heeft zij haar leed weggestopt. Totdat zij enige jaren geleden klachten kreeg zoals concentratieverlies op haar werk, angst uit het niets, nare dromen over toen en onverdraagzaamheid naar haar gezin toe. En omdat ze van nature positief en hoopvol is, is ze ruim 20 jaar na dato ermee aan de slag gegaan. Met succes!

Fragment uit het boek:

Vanuit intuïtie ontwikkelde zij een eigen methode om vredig afscheid te nemen van haar verborgen verlies. Op dat moment heeft zij haar eigen verleden en toekomst als het ware herschreven. Joyce staat nu compleet anders in het leven en ze kan enorm gelukkig en dankbaar zijn om alledaagse dingen. En de band met haar kinderen is beter dan ooit!

Wist je trouwens dat 1 op de 10 zwangerschappen eindigt in een miskraam? Grote kans dus dat jij ook iemand in je naaste omgeving kent met een dergelijke ervaring. Misschien ben jij je hier bewust van, en misschien ook niet. Want wie weet heeft deze vrouw ook haar verlies weggestopt en ondervindt zij daar nu klachten van. Maar ook zij verdient het om weer gelukkig te zijn, toch?

Wil jij meedoen?

Voor € 1200 kunnen wij het boek 'Geen beschuit met muisjes' laten editen, grafisch vormgeven en drukken.

Als we € 7500 of meer ophalen kunnen we naast het drukken en verspreiden van het boek in het Nederlands, het boek ook laten vertalen in het Engels.

Als we € 17.000 ophalen kunnen we het boek in het Nederlands laten drukken en tevens laten vertalen, drukken en verspreiden in het Engels.

Als we meer dan € 17.000 ophalen doneren we een deel aan Make-a-Wish.

Andere  manieren om te helpen:

  • Iedereen die je kent te informeren over dit project. Geef zoveel mogelijk bekendheid aan het boek 'Geen beschuit met muisjes' op Indiegogo.com.
  • De Indiegogo share tools te gebruiken!

Dank je wel!


Are you in?

We want to print Joyce her book 'No baby'(work-title). It is our mission and passion to help mothers who have put away their miscarriage in the past to transform their experiences and to brake open the taboo.

Why?

Joyce is an expert. Her close circle lay the blame on her and she put away her suffering. Until a few years ago. She had complaints as loss of concentration at work, anxiety out of nowhere, bad dreams about the miscaririage and intolerance to her family. Because she is positive and hopeful by nature, she started cope with her miscarriage more than 20 years after it happens. With success!

From intuition she developed her own method in peaceful dealing  with her hidden loss. At that time, she has rewritten her past and her own future as it were. Joyce stands completely different now in life and she can be extremely happy and grateful for everyday things. And the relationship with her children is better than ever!

Did you know that 1 in 10 pregnancies ends in miscarriage? It is very likely that you also know someone in your immediate environment with such an experience. Maybe you're aware of this and maybe not. Because who knows this woman has put away her loss and she is now faces complaints because of this. But they deserve to be happy again, right?

Will you join us?

For € 1,200 we can edit, graphic design and print the book 'Miskraam Verwerken'.

When we collect € 7,500 or more, we can have the book translated into English and print the book.

When we collect € 17,000 or more, we can translate, print, distribute the book with in Dutch and English.

When we collect more than € 17,000, we donate a portion to Make-A-Wish.


Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes it is just not posible to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank  you.

story:
My name is Crystal and I just graduated with a Master's of Acupuncture from the New England School of Acupuncture in Newton, MA. Like most people, I am leaving school with a massive amount of student debt, but that will not stop me from opening up a clinic to serve communities in the city that are greatly misunderstood and under-served.

My Story:

When I was in High School I got very sick and my western doctors could not figure out what was wrong. I stumbled upon alternative medicine and was 100% healed within one year of treatments and then I decided that is what I wanted to do with my life. To help people who had no hope.

I have always been “alternative”. Yes, I have tattoos and piercings and I dress differently than other people, but that’s who I am and I love myself for it. I have always been true to myself and I want to help other people do the same. In order to do this I want to focus my healing on a particular community- one I feel is completely misunderstood and greatly under-served. Now that I have finished my acupuncture training, my main goal is to cater to the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender and Questioning (LGBTQ) community and the Body Modification community (those who have tattoos/piercings and other body modifications).

The Clinic:

I plan to open up a clinic called “AcuPUNKture: Your Alternative Place for Healing”. I want to open my doors to all types of people, focusing most on providing a “Safe haven” for transgender individuals. So many transgender people don’t seek health care due to the stigmas and stereotypes in our society. There are so many homeless transgender teenagers who are misunderstood and living on the streets because of it and I want to offer them a place to feel comfortable and “at home”. If I can even make one person feel like they are special and not a “freak”, to offer a place that has no gender discrimination- or any type of discrimination at all- I would be so happy. Everyone deserves to feel special, to feel like they are accepted and have a firm footing in this world. No one should feel bad about the way they look, or dress, or identify sexually, about how many piercings or tattoos they have or however they chose to identify in this world. No one should feel shame when they go to a doctor’s appointment and only have the option to choose “Male or female" on the health history form.

I have made it my personal goal to make sure everyone I meet knows they are accepted for exactly who they are, regardless of their backgrounds, sexual orientation, gender identification, body modifications, or however they identify or present themselves in this world. I firmly believe this is my calling in life. I am here to help people find themselves, to make peace with themselves and learn to love themselves and share the beauty that they are with the rest of the world. Together, my patients and I will use the healing power of acupuncture as a tool to facilitate the healing of both body and mind and conquer any obstacles that present themselves along the way.

With your help I will open a community style, afforable ($20-30 per treatment) Acupuncture clinic in Jamaica Plain, MA and make all of this a reality!

What funding will provide: 

With your help I can open up an affordable safe haven for all who seek affordable alternative health care. The funding will help me with overhead and clinic costs as I start out my acupuncture clinic in Jamaica Plain. 

This includes:

- Helping pay rent in JP, a hugely underserved community when it comes to affordable acupuncture- with retail rents as high as those on Newbury Street- making it very difficult to offer low-cost services in this area. Rent per square footage is extremely expensive ranging anywhere from $800/month for 300 square feet to $2000+ for larger spaces.

- (10) treatment tables/recliner chairs which range from $100-500 per item

-paying front desk staff to book appointments/greet patients/etc. 

-treatment supplies: sterile, single-use disposable needles ($30-50 per 1000 count box) moxa, essential oils (15-30/bottle), biohazard containers (5-10/bottle) and disposing of needles. 

-malpractice insurance ($1025 per year)

-advertising and marketing in the local community and in newspapers, business cards, etc. ($ variable)

- scheduling program to book patients and keep SOAP notes  (70$/month) 

-electricity to keep the lights on ($ variable)

-small heaters to keep the treatment rooms nice and warm ($20-50 each)

-small stereos to play relaxing music in the treatment rooms ($50-100) 

-sheets and blankets for covering the tables and keeping patients warm and cozy ($5-10 each)

-office supplies- paper for health history forms

-This funding will allow me to offer inexpensive treatments  (20-30$ range) to all who seek them.

** I eventually want to offer a weekly day of free acupuncture treatments to homeless transgender youth. 

**If I do not reach my entire goal the funds will still go into the clinic and offering people inexpensive acupuncture treatments.  I am determined to open this clinic no matter what happens but any funding would help me get started and touch so many deserving people faster.

Other ways you can help:

Even if you can't contribute with funding, please spread the word in your community and share my campaign! Any contributions help so much thank you!!!

story:
Courage for Cullen

Our nephew Cullen was born with a congenital heart condition called Hypoplastic Left Heart Syndrome (HLHS). He has already had his first surgery at 2 days old, and there are more to come. 
His parents, Darren and Ashley, and his brothers Dominic and Oliver are already smitten with him, even though they have not been able to spend much time together.
Families are stronger when they are together, so please help us raise the funds to allow the Deschenes family to stay as close to him as possible, and hopefully not  worry so much about bills or other expenses.

All donations will benefit Cullen and his family, not only for peace of mind but as a virtual hug and show of support for the long journey ahead.

story:
Greetings from Guwahati. A remote area in the Northeast section of India.

I am a Volunteer nurse working with Operation Smile. We do free surgeries for people with cleft lip, cleft palate & other facial deformities.
Cleft lip & cleft palate can be a death sentence, here in India, as babies can not feed properly & are very often underweight & malnourished.
Here at the cleft center, we have a nutrition program to help get these babies up to a safe weight, so we can perform the operation.
Children here, growing up with these deformities, are often ostracized from the community, not allowed to go to school & even beaten, for NO BETTER REASON THAN THEY LOOK DIFFERENT!
Some children come here barefoot~ no shoes or socks,with only the clothes on their backs.

These families can not afford clothes, nutritional supplements & formulas,let alone a toy, as they barely make enough to survive. 
I am trying to raise money so I can make life a little better for these patients & families.
Any donation is appreciated, everything I raise will be used 100% for supplies~ 
Thank you all for your generosity
Warm Regards
susan


With the money I raise here, I will mainly be focusing on Formula, Nutritional Supplements, Baby Bottles and Special Cleft Nipples that are very hard to find in India.

For less than the price of a fancy Latte ~ 5 bucks, I can give a malnourished baby a 400 gm box of Lactogen Baby Formula, or a 200 gm container of PediaSure.

$100 equals 25 boxes of Lactogen~

$500 equals 125 boxes ~ the possibilities are endless.

If you can't afford to donate, please just help spread the word.....anyone who will listen, anyone who can help.

"No act of kindness, no matter how small, is wasted." aesop


I don't know the answers to end the poverty here in India ~ but I do know any act of kindness will not go unnoticed. We are our brother's keepers.....

story:
My name is Kelly McGregor Fournier.  I am the Mother of four beautiful children.  My oldest daughter Sloane Reilly Fournier was born with Trisomy 18.  She is now 15 years old, but was not expected to live past 1 year of age.  Our biggest issue has been seizures.  She started having seizures at five years old.  We have given her different medications, tried diets specific to helping seizures, and still the seizures breakthrough. 

She has had several different types of seizures over the years including tonic clonics, drop seizures, staring, nocturnal seizures, clusters, and her newest; tonic clonics with a scream.  At one point she could barely attend school because of the amount of seizures she was having daily - between 30 and 50 a day while taking medication.

The seizures have ravaged her body.  She has gone from a vibrant child, learning to walk, eat off a spoon, potty trained -  to being in a wheelchair, fed by a g-tube, in diapers, unable to hold her head up and she sleeps about 18 hours a day.  We had to stop all physical, occupational, and speech therapy because she can't stay awake to do any of the tasks.

We would like to try a low pressure hyperbaric oxygen therapy chamber.  It is known to stimulate: the metabolism of nerve cells that have been deprived of oxygen, the removal of toxic metabolic products, increase blood vessel density that will provide a continuous source of oxygen along with many other benefits. 

Unfortunately, because it's considered an alternative  medical treatment, there is no insurance plan that will cover hyperbaric oxygen therapy.  We are raising money to pay the $9,000 needed to pay for 40 sessions in the chamber this summer.  Our hope is that Sloane will benefit greatly from the therapy.  At this point, we are scared that she will just continue to go downhill and she will just be gone one morning. 

Please, please, please forward this to your friends and family and their friends and family.  Together we are hoping to get as close to our goal as possible.  We work, we have insurance, but sometimes it's not enough and we are looking to our community for help.  Please help us!!!! 

All of the proceeds will be used for Sloane's benefit.  If we go past our goal, extra money will be used to purchase a safer, sturdier bath chair for Sloane.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Florian Dellé, from memory-sports.com. I am a memory athlete and a memory coach. For eleven years I am fascinated by the world of memory sports. I competed at fourteen different championships and was an official arbiter at many others. Besides the Memory Athletes Association (MAA), I am a member of Germany's MemoryXL and an official Level Two Arbiter of the World Memory Sports Council (WMSC).

The idea behind this project is to create a new kind of memory competition, by bringing different memory based sports together. For the 1. MAA US Memory Open we will make three official individual events, which will overlap to crown the very first MAA Champion:

  • a National Standard WMSC memory championship, fully rankable in the world rankings. It will be open to all nationalities. The US Memory Champion will still be crowned at the annual USAMC, organized by Tony Dottino.
  • an Extreme Memory Tournament, using the brand new XMTlive software. This competition will be slightly different to the XMT 2014 in San Diego. It is still to be descided if this event will be open to everyone.
  • a World Cubing Association (WCA) standard championship, with all 16 disciplines. The focus for the upcoming MAA Champion will be the four blindfold disciplines, while the others don't matter for the memory event. Cubers with no interest in the other memory events are still welcome to compete just in the WCA event. 

The event will be between 1-2 days, which is yet to be decided. The details for the new MAA Open rules will soon be announced. All interested competitors can already train for each individual competition. 

The 1. MAA US Memory Open will just be the beginning. Help us to set a new spark into a thriving and fascinating young sport. And maybe the next MAA Open will come to your country. 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The funding will be needed for the following things:

  • Quality cups for all top three positions in each individual event and age group and medals for all discipline winners.
  • SpeedStacks Timer and SpeedStacks Tournament Displays; these might be borrowed if possible.
  • We haven't found a location yet. It is possible that we will find a public or private sponsor like a school, where we can host the event. But it is also possible that we have to rent something.
  • The event is spectator friendly and digital. To make it possible for all viewers we will rent some big displays and cameras.
  • Official arbiters from all three events must get back their expenses. One of them is myself (level two WMSC arbiter), flying in from Costa Rica. Don't worry: We don't fly 1. class and live in the Hilton!
  • Some small prize money would be nice.
  • If there is less money coming in, we will still try to make the event at a smaller scale.
  • If there is more money than the 5.000 Dollar coming in, all additional funds will be put into the competition, mainly the prize money.

    The Impact

    With taking this step of creating the 1. MAA Open we will achieve many things at once:
    • Bringing the first fully rankable WMSC Open Memory Championship to America, open to all nationalities
    • Creating the second ever Extreme Memory Tournament, opening it to more competitors
    • Including blindfolded cubing for the first time in a memory competition
    • Rising awareness to memory sports and memory techniques in the US Media
    • Presenting new concepts for further disciplines to the world of memory sports, like team disciplines for example

      Risks & Challenges

      The time set in November is giving us just 3-4 months of planning. But it will provide every competitor with the only choice of competing in an official WMSC event before the World Memory Championship in China in December 2014. With a growing interest in the US, Canada, Mexico and other american countries, it will be a great opportunity for everyone to test their skills.

      Luckily we are all very well connected and have many friends and helpers, that would like to contribute to our plan. And with lots of experience from previous championships, we will be able to create a decent event in that brief time.
       

        Other Ways You Can Help

        • Share this campaign with your friends
        • Become an official sponsor outside of this campaign
        • Come and help us as an arbiter at the WMSC event
        • Become a memory athlete and compete yourself

story:
Meet IRIS: light-activated breast rehabilitation through Low-level laser therapy (LLLT technology). Non-invasive and only requiring a few minutes per day, IRIS promotes breast elasticity, firmness and shape.

IRIS provides red & IR light therapy through two flower shaped silicon pads. Based on scientifically proven cellular-level regeneration through bio-stimulation, IRIS helps slow down and even reverse the effect of aging on breasts.

 

 

 

IRIS stays in place with no adhesive. The soft pads are held in place by any bra, ensuring they never fall off. Soft and un-intrusive, the silicon pads feel like a soft cushion.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

IRIS can fit around any breast size. With its flower-shape design, IRIS was created to cup perfectly around any pair of breasts providing even light treatment distribution.

 

Wear IRIS while going about your daily activities. Feel free to rest, exercise or any other light activity. LLLT therapy does not cause any discomfort or force you to stay still. Made of soft silicon material, you will barely notice that IRIS pads are there.

Ptosis is a condition characterized by breast skin losing its elasticity and stretching. Brought on by a combination of factors including breast size, aging and gravity, ptosis can also be aggravated by a variety of lifestyle choices. On a biological level, ptosis is caused by the stretching of the cooper’s ligament, a connective tissue that helps maintain structural integrity of the breast.

IRIS utilizes both red light and near-IR light, operating on a wavelength between 650 – 950 nm. By providing stimulation across the wavelengths of therapeutic light, IRIS offers enhanced penetration and light absorption. 

Visible light penetrates the skin and stimulates the body’s natural processes on a cellular level. Enhanced mitochondrial function leads to a series of metabolic events including increased production of collagen, improved circulation and lymph system activity.

 

Wear IRIS while going about your daily activities. LLLT therapy does not cause any discomfort or force you to stay still. Do chores or any light activity while undergoing treatment.

 

Using IRIS is simple and can be set-up in minutes. Choose duration of treatment from 10 minutes, 20 minutes or 30 minutes depending on your schedule. Toggle mode to choose red or IR light therapy. LED lights on the top shows your treatment progress.

 

 

 

 

1. Is IRIS Safe?

The safety of light therapy has been certified and is already currently in use by numerous medical organizations in fields as diverse as wound healing, skin regeneration, hair growth and pain relief. Covered in soft silicone, LEDs are not directly in contact with skin and non-invasive IRIS does not penetrate the skin through heat energy but rather through light. Finally, the silicone body itself, which comes in contact with skin, is made of the same safe material as nipple shields used during breast feeding.

 

2. Can I use IRIS over 30 minutes?

As with any change to the body, expecting drastic improvements should not be expected nor are they safe. We highly recommend that rather than undergoing prolonged therapy sessions, it is preferable to use IRIS diligently over an extended period of time. We do not recommend that IRIS be used for sessions longer than 10 to 30 minutes a day.

 

3. Does IRIS warm up during operation? If so, can you feel the warmth?

Because IRIS emits energy through light, a certain amount of heat is produced, but always stays within range of the temperature of the human body. While IRIS may cause a slight rise in body temperature, it can mostly be attributed to the body’s biochemical reaction to the treatment rather than heat generated from the pads and is most often unnoticeable.

 

4. How long before I see enhancements to my breasts?

While IRIS works for all women, the individual results will vary because the cause of ptosis varies by woman. Depending on the cause of ptosis, there will be differences in breast condition which alter the time frame for recovery. If used consistently over time, no matter the cause of ptosis, IRIS will provide rejuvenating results.

 

5. Can I exercise or move around with IRIS?

Of course. The IRIS controller is very compact, with a size and weight similar to a smart phone. The light emitting pads are made of flexible and light-weight silicone to not interfere with any of your daily routines.
